verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُ ۚ وَمَا أَنْفَقْتُمْ مِنْ شَيْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ الرَّازِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “My Lord gives abundantly to whom He wills of His servants—or withholds it. Whatever you spend, He will replace it; and He is the Best of providers.”

verses.verseString: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ أَهَٰؤُلَاءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when He gathers them all together, then say to the angels, “Was it you these used to worship?”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ أَنْتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِنْ دُونِهِمْ ۖ بَلْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ الْجِنَّ ۖ أَكْثَرُهُمْ بِهِمْ مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “Be You glorified; You are our Master, not them. In fact, they used to worship the jinn, and most of them had faith in them.”

verses.verseString: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يَمْلِكُ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ نَفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذُوقُوا عَذَابَ النَّارِ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “So today, none of you has the power to benefit or harm the other.” And We will say to those who did wrong, “Taste the agony of the Fire, which you used to deny.”

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتُنَا بَيِّنَاتٍ قَالُوا مَا هَٰذَا إِلَّا رَجُلٌ يُرِيدُ أَنْ يَصُدَّكُمْ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَقَالُوا مَا هَٰذَا إِلَّا إِفْكٌ مُفْتَرًى ۚ وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And when Our enlightening Verses are recited to them, they say, “This is nothing but a man who wants to prevent you from what your ancestors worshiped.” And they say, “This is nothing but a fabricated lie.” And those who disbelieve say of the Truth when it has come to them, “This is nothing but plain magic.”

verses.verseString: وَمَا آتَيْنَاهُمْ مِنْ كُتُبٍ يَدْرُسُونَهَا ۖ وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمْ قَبْلَكَ مِنْ نَذِيرٍ
verses.verseStringB: Although We had never given them any scriptures to study, nor did We ever send them a warner before you.

verses.verseString: وَكَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ وَمَا بَلَغُوا مِعْشَارَ مَا آتَيْنَاهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوا رُسُلِي ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.verseStringB: Those before them also denied. And they have not attained even one-tenth of what We had given them. They denied My messengers, so how was My rejection?

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَعِظُكُمْ بِوَاحِدَةٍ ۖ أَنْ تَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ مَثْنَىٰ وَفُرَادَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُوا ۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُمْ مِنْ جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ لَكُمْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I offer you a single advice: devote yourselves to Allah, in pairs, or individually. Then think. Your friend is not crazy. He is just a warner to you, before the advent of severe punishment.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُمْ مِنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “Had I ever asked you for a reward, it is yours. My reward is only from Allah, and He is Witness over all things.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقْذِفُ بِالْحَقِّ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “My Lord projects the truth, Knower of the Unseen.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ جَاءَ الْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ الْبَاطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “The Truth has come; while falsehood can neither originate, nor regenerate.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنْ ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَا أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِي ۖ وَإِنِ اهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِي إِلَيَّ رَبِّي ۚ إِنَّهُ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “If I go astray, I go astray only to my own loss. And if I am guided, it is through what my Lord inspires me. He is Hearing and Near.”

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذْ فَزِعُوا فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا مِنْ مَكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: And if only you could see, when they will be horrified, and there is no escape, and they are seized from a nearby place.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا آمَنَّا بِهِ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّنَاوُشُ مِنْ مَكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: And they say, “We have believed in it.” But how can they attain it from a distant place?

verses.verseString: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا بِهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ مِنْ مَكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: They have disbelieved it in the past. And they made allegations from a distant place.

verses.verseString: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِمْ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا فِي شَكٍّ مُرِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: And a barrier will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their counterparts before. They are confounded by doubt.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ جَاعِلِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُولِي أَجْنِحَةٍ مَثْنَىٰ وَثُلَاثَ وَرُبَاعَ ۚ يَزِيدُ فِي الْخَلْقِ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Praise be to Allah, Programmer of the heavens and the earth, Maker of the angels: messengers with wings—double, triple, and quadruple. He adds to creation as He wills. Allah is Capable of everything.

verses.verseString: مَا يَفْتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِنْ رَحْمَةٍ فَلَا مُمْسِكَ لَهَا ۖ وَمَا يُمْسِكْ فَلَا مُرْسِلَ لَهُ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: Whatever mercy Allah unfolds for the people, none can withhold it. And whatsoever He withholds, none can release it thereafter. He is the Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ هَلْ مِنْ خَالِقٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ يَرْزُقُكُمْ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: O, people! Remember Allah’s Blessing upon you. Is there a creator other than Allah who provides for you from heaven and earth? There is no god except He. So how do you deviate?

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
verses.verseStringB: If they reject you: messengers before you were rejected. To Allah, all matters are returned.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُمْ بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
verses.verseStringB: O, people! The promise of Allah is true. So let not the lowly life seduce you, nor let the Deceiver deceive you regarding Allah.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّا ۚ إِنَّمَا يَدْعُو حِزْبَهُ لِيَكُونُوا مِنْ أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
verses.verseStringB: Satan is an enemy to you, so take him as an enemy. He only calls his gang to be among the inmates of the Inferno.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ مَغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Those who disbelieve will suffer a harsh punishment, but those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and a great reward.

verses.verseString: أَفَمَنْ زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ فَرَآهُ حَسَنًا ۖ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۖ فَلَا تَذْهَبْ نَفْسُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسَرَاتٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: What of him whose evil deed was made attractive to him, and so he regards it as good? Allah leads astray whom He wills, and He guides whom He wills. So do not waste yourself sorrowing over them. Allah knows what they do.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ الرِّيَاحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابًا فَسُقْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٍ مَيِّتٍ فَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ النُّشُورُ
verses.verseStringB: Allah is He who sends the winds, which agitate clouds, which We drive to a dead land, and thereby revive the ground after it had died. Likewise is the Resurrection.

verses.verseString: مَنْ كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
verses.verseStringB: Whoever desires honor—all honor belongs to Allah. To Him ascends speech that is pure, and He elevates righteous conduct. But as for those who plot evil, a terrible punishment awaits them, and the planning of these will fail.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ مِنْ تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ۚ وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنْثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ ۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِنْ مُعَمَّرٍ وَلَا يُنْقَصُ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Allah created you from dust, then from a small drop, then He made you pairs. No female conceives, or delivers, except with His knowledge. And no living thing advances in years, or its life is shortened, but is in a Record. That is certainly easy for Allah.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْبَحْرَانِ هَٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ سَائِغٌ شَرَابُهُ وَهَٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ ۖ وَمِنْ كُلٍّ تَأْكُلُونَ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُونَ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا ۖ وَتَرَى الْفُلْكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبْتَغُوا مِنْ فَضْلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The two bodies of water are not alike: one is fresh, palatable, and pleasant to drink, while the other is salty and bitter. Yet from each, you eat tender meat, and you extract ornaments that you wear. And you see the ships plowing through them, so that you may seek of His bounty, and so that you may give thanks.

verses.verseString: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْ قِطْمِيرٍ
verses.verseStringB: He merges the night into the day, and He merges the day into the night. And He regulated the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. As for those you invoke besides Him: they do not possess a speck.

verses.verseString: إِنْ تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا دُعَاءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا مَا اسْتَجَابُوا لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ
verses.verseStringB: If you pray to them, they cannot hear your prayer. And if they were to hear, they could not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will reject your partnership. None can inform you like the Expert.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ أَنْتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: O, people! It is you who stand in need of Allah; while Allah is the Rich, the Praiseworthy.

verses.verseString: إِنْ يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: If He wills, He can do away with you, and produce a new creation.

verses.verseString: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٍ
verses.verseStringB: And that is not difficult for Allah.

verses.verseString: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَإِنْ تَدْعُ مُثْقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمْلِهَا لَا يُحْمَلْ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۗ إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ بِالْغَيْبِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۚ وَمَنْ تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفْسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: No burdened soul can bear the burdens of another. Even if one weighted down calls for help with its burden, none of it will be lifted, even by a close relative. You are to warn those who fear their Lord inwardly and perform the prayer. Whoever purifies himself, purifies himself for his own good. To Allah is the final return.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: Not equal are the blind and the seeing.

verses.verseString: وَلَا الظُّلُمَاتُ وَلَا النُّورُ
verses.verseStringB: Nor are darkness and light.

verses.verseString: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الْحَرُورُ
verses.verseStringB: Nor are shade and torrid heat.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَحْيَاءُ وَلَا الْأَمْوَاتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۖ وَمَا أَنْتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَنْ فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.verseStringB: Nor are equal the living and the dead. Allah makes whom He will hear, but you cannot make those in the graves hear.

verses.verseString: إِنْ أَنْتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: You are only a warner.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِنْ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: We sent you with the truth: a deliverer of good news, and a warner. There is no community, but a warner has passed through it.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالْكِتَابِ الْمُنِيرِ
verses.verseStringB: If they deny you, those before them also denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs, divine Books, and the Enlightening Scripture.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.verseStringB: Then I seized those who disbelieved—so how was My rejection?

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ
verses.verseStringB: Have you not considered that Allah sends down water from the sky? With it, We produce fruits of diverse colors. And in the mountains are streaks of white and red—of diverse hues—and pitch-black.

verses.verseString: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ وَالدَّوَابِّ وَالْأَنْعَامِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهُ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
verses.verseStringB: Likewise: human beings, animals, and livestock are of various colors. From among His worshipers, the learned fear Allah. Allah is Almighty, Oft-Forgiving.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنْفَقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَارَةً لَنْ تَبُورَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who read Allah’s book, and perform the prayer, and donate from what We have provided for them—secretly and publicly—expect a trade that will not fail.

verses.verseString: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُمْ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.verseStringB: So that He may pay them their dues in full, and increase them from His grace. He is Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِي أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ هُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِ لَخَبِيرٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: What We inspired in you, of the Book, is the truth—confirming what came before it. Allah is Well-Informed of His worshipers, All-Seeing.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا الْكِتَابَ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِنَفْسِهِ وَمِنْهُمْ مُقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: Then We passed the Book to those of Our servants whom We selected. Some of them wrong their souls, and some follow a middle course, and some are foremost in good deeds, by Allah’s leave—that is the greatest favor.

verses.verseString: جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِنْ ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: The Gardens of Eden, which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their clothing therein will be silk.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.verseStringB: And they will say, “Praise be to Allah, Who has lifted all sorrow from us. Our Lord is Most Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ الْمُقَامَةِ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ
verses.verseStringB: He Who settled us in the Home of Permanence, by His grace: where boredom will not touch us, and fatigue will not afflict us.”

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمْ مِنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٍ
verses.verseStringB: As for those who disbelieve: for them is the Fire of Hell, where they will never be finished off and die, nor will its punishment be reduced for them. Thus We repay every disbeliever.

verses.verseString: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُمْ مَا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَنْ تَذَكَّرَ وَجَاءَكُمُ النَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا فَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِنْ نَصِيرٍ
verses.verseStringB: And they will scream in it, “Our Lord, let us out, and we will act righteously, differently from the way we used to act.” Did We not give you a life long enough, in which anyone who wanted to understand would have understood? And the warner did come to you. So taste. The wrongdoers have no helper.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمُ غَيْبِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.verseStringB: Allah is the Knower of the future of the heavens and the earth. He knows what the hearts contain.

verses.verseString: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَائِفَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَنْ كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.verseStringB: It is He Who made you successors on earth. Whoever disbelieves, his disbelief will recoil upon him. The disbelief of the disbelievers adds only to their Lord's disfavor of them. The disbelief of the disbelievers adds only to their loss.

verses.verseString: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ شُرَكَاءَكُمُ الَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُوا مِنَ الْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَابًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِنْ يَعِدُ الظَّالِمُونَ بَعْضُهُمْ بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “Have you considered those partners of yours that you call upon instead of Allah? Show me what they have created on earth. Or do they have a partnership in the heavens?” Or did we give them a book whose clear teachings they follow? In fact, the wrongdoers promise one another nothing but delusion.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَنْ تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِنْ زَالَتَا إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا
verses.verseStringB: Allah keeps the heavens and the earth from falling apart. And were they to fall apart, there is none to hold them together except He. He is Clement, Forgiving.

verses.verseString: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِنْ جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
verses.verseStringB: And they swore by Allah, with their most solemn oaths, that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than any of the communities. Yet when a warner came to them, it only increased them in aversion.

verses.verseString: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: Priding themselves on earth, and scheming evil. But evil scheming overwhelms none but its authors. Do they expect anything but the precedent of those of old? You will find no change in Allah’s practice, and you will find no deviation from Allah’s practice.

verses.verseString: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنْظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: Have they not journeyed on earth, and observed the fate of those before them? They were far superior to them in might. And nothing in the heavens or on earth can thwart Allah. He is Knowledgeable and Capable.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِنْ دَابَّةٍ وَلَٰكِنْ يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: If Allah were to punish people for what they have earned, He would not leave a single creature on its surface. But He postpones them until a stated time. Then, when their time has arrived—Allah is Observant of His servants.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: يس
verses.verseStringB: Ya. Seen.

verses.verseString: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: By the Wise Quran.

verses.verseString: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: You are one of the messengers.

verses.verseString: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: On a straight path.

verses.verseString: تَنْزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: The revelation of the Almighty, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: لِتُنْذِرَ قَوْمًا مَا أُنْذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: To warn a people whose ancestors were not warned, so they are unaware.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The word has been justified against most of them—for they do not believe.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُمْ مُقْمَحُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We placed shackles upon their necks, up to their chins, so they are forced up.

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And We placed a barrier in front of them, and a barrier behind them, and We enshrouded them; so they cannot see.

verses.verseString: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And it is the same for them, whether you warn them, or do not warn them—they will not believe.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: You only warn whoever follows the Message and fears the Compassionate unseen. So give him the good news of forgiveness and a generous reward.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: It is We who give life to the dead. And We write what they have forwarded, and their traces. We keep track of all things in a Clear Registry.

verses.verseString: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُمْ مَثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And give them the example of the inhabitants of the town, when the messengers came to it.

verses.verseString: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ مُرْسَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We sent to them two messengers, but they denied both, so We reinforced them with a third. They said, “We are sent to you.”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا مَا أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنْزَلَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “You are only humans like us, and the Compassionate did not reveal anything. You are only lying.”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Our Lord knows that we are sent to you.

verses.verseString: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.verseStringB: And our only duty is clear delivery.”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِنْ لَمْ تَنْتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُمْ مِنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “We see a bad omen in you. If you do not give up, we will stone you, and a painful punishment from us will befall you.”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُمْ مَعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِنْ ذُكِّرْتُمْ ۚ بَلْ أَنْتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُسْرِفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Your bad omen is within yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? In fact, you are excessive people.”

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And a man came running from the outskirts of the city. He said, “O my people, follow the messengers.

verses.verseString: اتَّبِعُوا مَنْ لَا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُمْ مُهْتَدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Follow those who ask of you no payment—and are themselves guided.

verses.verseString: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “And why should I not worship Him Who originated me, and to Whom you will be returned?

verses.verseString: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِنْ دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِنْ يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنْقِذُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Shall I take gods apart from Him? If the Beneficent intends harm for me, their intercession would not avail me at all, nor would they save me.

verses.verseString: إِنِّي إِذًا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: In that case, I would be completely lost.

verses.verseString: إِنِّي آمَنْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
verses.verseStringB: I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me.”

verses.verseString: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: It was said, “Enter Paradise.” He said, “If only my people knew.

verses.verseString: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: How my Lord has forgiven me, and made me of the honored.”

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَنْزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ مِنْ جُنْدٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنْزِلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: After him, We sent down no hosts from heaven against his people, nor would We send down.

verses.verseString: إِنْ كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: It was just a single Shout, and they were extinguished.

verses.verseString: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِمْ مِنْ رَسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Alas for the servants! Never did a messenger come to them, but they ridiculed him.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُمْ مِنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them? How none of them returned to them?

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ كُلٌّ لَمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: All of them, every single one of them, will be summoned before Us.

verses.verseString: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And there is a sign for them in the dead earth: We give it life, and We produce from it grains from which they eat.

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِنْ نَخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
verses.verseStringB: And We placed in it gardens of date-palms and grapevines, and We caused springs to gush out of it.

verses.verseString: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِنْ ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So that they may eat of its fruit—although their hands did not make it. Will they not be thankful?

verses.verseString: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنْبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنْفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Glory be to He, who created all the pairs, of whatever the earth grows, and of themselves, and of what they do not know.

verses.verseString: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُمْ مُظْلِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Another sign for them is the night: We strip the day from it—and they are in darkness.

verses.verseString: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: And the sun runs its course towards its destined point. That is the design of the Almighty, the All-Knowing.

verses.verseString: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: And the moon: We have disposed it in phases—until it returns like the old twig.

verses.verseString: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنْبَغِي لَهَا أَنْ تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The sun is not to overtake the moon, nor is the night to outpace the day. Each glides in an orbit.

verses.verseString: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Another sign for them is that We carried their ancestors in the loaded Ark.

verses.verseString: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُمْ مِنْ مِثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And We created for them the like of it, in which they ride.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ نَشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْقَذُونَ
verses.verseStringB: If We willed, We could drown them—with no screaming to be heard from them, nor will they be saved.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Except by mercy from Us, and enjoyment for a while.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Yet when it is said to them, “Beware of what is ahead of you, and what is behind you, so you may receive mercy .”

verses.verseString: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِمْ مِنْ آيَةٍ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Never came to them a sign of their Lord’s signs, but they turned away from it.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنْفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَنْ لَوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And when it is said to them, “Donate from what Allah has provided for you,” those who disbelieve say to those who believe, “Should we feed someone whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to? You are clearly astray.”

verses.verseString: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And they say, “When will this promise come about—if you are truthful?”

verses.verseString: مَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: All they can expect is a single blast, which will seize them while they feud.

verses.verseString: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They will be unable to make a will. And they will not return to their families.

verses.verseString: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُمْ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنْسِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And the Trumpet will be blown: and at once, they will rush from the graves to their Lord.

verses.verseString: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَنْ بَعَثَنَا مِنْ مَرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “Woe to us! Who resurrected us from our resting-place?” This is what the Mercy-Giver had promised; the messengers have told the truth.”

verses.verseString: إِنْ كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: It will be but a single Scream: and at once, they will all be arraigned before Us.

verses.verseString: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, no soul will be wronged in the least, and you will be rewarded only for what you used to do.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The inhabitants of Paradise, on that Day, will be happily engaged.

verses.verseString: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They and their spouses, in shades, reclining on couches.

verses.verseString: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُمْ مَا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: There they will have fruits. They will have whatever they ask for.

verses.verseString: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِنْ رَبٍّ رَحِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Peace—a saying from a Most Merciful Lord.

verses.verseString: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But step aside today, you criminals.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَنْ لَا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: Did I not covenant with you, O Children of Adam, that you shall not worship Satan? That he is your sworn enemy?

verses.verseString: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: And that you shall worship Me? This is a straight path.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنْكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He has misled great multitudes of you. Did you not reason?

verses.verseString: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: This is Gehenna that you were promised.

verses.verseString: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Roast in it today, for having disbelieved.

verses.verseString: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, We will seal their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to earn.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And had We willed, We would have blotted out their eyes. Then they would race to the path; yet how would they see?

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And had We willed, We would have transformed them in their place. Then they could neither advance, nor go back.

verses.verseString: وَمَنْ نُعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Whomever We give long life, We decline his development. Do they not understand?

verses.verseString: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنْبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: We did not teach him poetry, nor is it suitable for him. It is only a reminder and a Clear Quran.

verses.verseString: لِيُنْذِرَ مَنْ كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: To warn whoever is alive, and to prove the Word against the faithless.

verses.verseString: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُمْ مِمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have they not considered that We created for them, of Our Handiwork, livestock that they own?

verses.verseString: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And We subdued them for them. Some of them they ride, and some they eat.

verses.verseString: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they have in them other benefits—and beverages. Will they not give thanks?

verses.verseString: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَعَلَّهُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Yet they have taken to themselves gods other than Allah, that perhaps they may be helped.

verses.verseString: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُنْدٌ مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They cannot help them, although they are arrayed as troops for them.

verses.verseString: فَلَا يَحْزُنْكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So do not let their words sadden you. We know what they conceal, and what they disclose.

verses.verseString: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: Does the human being not consider that We created him from a drop? Yet he becomes a fierce adversary.

verses.verseString: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَنْ يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: And he produces arguments against Us, and he forgets his own creation. He says, “Who will revive the bones when they have decayed?”

verses.verseString: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنْشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “He who initiated them in the first instance will revive them. And He knows every creation.”

verses.verseString: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنْتُمْ مِنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He who produced for you fuel from the green trees, with which you kindle fire.

verses.verseString: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُمْ ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Certainly. He is the All-Knowing Creator.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَنْ يَقُولَ لَهُ كُنْ فَيَكُونُ
verses.verseStringB: His command, when He wills something, is to say to it, “Be,” and it comes to be.

verses.verseString: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So glory be to Him, in whose hand is the dominion of all things, and to Him, you will be returned.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
verses.verseStringB: By the aligners aligning.

verses.verseString: فَالزَّاجِرَاتِ زَجْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And the drivers driving.

verses.verseString: فَالتَّالِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And the reciters of the Reminder.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمْ لَوَاحِدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Your God is certainly One.

verses.verseString: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
verses.verseStringB: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and everything between them, and Lord of the Easts.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.verseStringB: We have decorated the lower heaven with the beauty of the planets.

verses.verseString: وَحِفْظًا مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَارِدٍ
verses.verseStringB: And protection from every defiant devil.

verses.verseString: لَا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِنْ كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.verseStringB: They cannot eavesdrop on the Supernal Elite, for they get bombarded from every side.

verses.verseString: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
verses.verseStringB: Repelled—they will have a lingering torment.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.verseStringB: Except for him who snatches a glimpse—he will be pursued by a piercing flare.

verses.verseString: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمْ مَنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُمْ مِنْ طِينٍ لَازِبٍ
verses.verseStringB: Inquire of them, “Are they more difficult to create, or those We created?” We created them from sticky clay.

verses.verseString: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But you wonder, and they ridicule.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And when reminded, they pay no attention.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا آيَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And when they see a sign, they ridicule.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And they say, “This is nothing but obvious magic.

verses.verseString: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.verseStringB: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected?

verses.verseString: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And our ancestors of old?”

verses.verseString: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنْتُمْ دَاخِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “Yes indeed, and you will be subdued.”

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنْظُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: It will be a single nudge, and they will be staring.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: And they will say, “Woe to us, this is Judgement Day.”

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “This is the Day of Separation that you used to deny.

verses.verseString: احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Gather those who did wrong, and their types, and what they used to worship.

verses.verseString: مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Besides Allah, and lead them to the path of Hell.

verses.verseString: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ مَسْئُولُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And stop them. They are to be questioned.”

verses.verseString: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: What is the matter with you? Why do you not help one another?

verses.verseString: بَلْ هُمُ الْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, on that Day, they will be submissive.

verses.verseString: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They will turn to one another, questioning one another.

verses.verseString: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “You used to approach us from the right.”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا بَلْ لَمْ تَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “You yourselves were not believers.

verses.verseString: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنْتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We had no authority over you. You yourselves were oppressive people.

verses.verseString: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So the Word of our Lord is justified against us. We are tasting it.

verses.verseString: فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَاوِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We seduced you. We were seducers.”

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, they will share in the punishment.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We deal with the guilty.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: When it was said to them, “There is no god except Allah,” they became arrogant.

verses.verseString: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَجْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: And said, “Are we to give up our gods for a mad poet?”

verses.verseString: بَلْ جَاءَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, he came with the truth, and he confirmed the messengers.

verses.verseString: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَائِقُو الْعَذَابِ الْأَلِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Most certainly, you will taste the painful punishment.

verses.verseString: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And you will be repaid only for what you used to do.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Not so for Allah’s chosen worshipers.

verses.verseString: أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَعْلُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: For them is a known provision.

verses.verseString: فَوَاكِهُ ۖ وَهُمْ مُكْرَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Fruits—and they will be honored.

verses.verseString: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the Gardens of Bliss.

verses.verseString: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: On furnishings, facing one another.

verses.verseString: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِكَأْسٍ مِنْ مَعِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: A cup from a flowing spring will be circulated among them.

verses.verseString: بَيْضَاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِلشَّارِبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: White and delicious to the drinkers.

verses.verseString: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنْزَفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Never polluted—and never intoxicating.

verses.verseString: وَعِنْدَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: With them will be maidens of modest gaze with lustrous eyes.

verses.verseString: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَكْنُونٌ
verses.verseStringB: As if they were guarded pearls.

verses.verseString: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they will approach one another, questioning.

verses.verseString: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: One of them will say, “I used to have a close friend.

verses.verseString: يَقُولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُصَدِّقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Who used to say, “Are you among those who believe?

verses.verseString: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.verseStringB: That after we die and become dust and bones, we will be called to account?”

verses.verseString: قَالَ هَلْ أَنْتُمْ مُطَّلِعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He will say, “Will you have a look?”

verses.verseString: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ فِي سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: So he will look, and He will see him in the midst of Hellfire.

verses.verseString: قَالَ تَاللَّهِ إِنْ كِدْتَ لَتُرْدِينِ
verses.verseStringB: He will say, “By Allah, you almost ruined me.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنْتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Were it not for my Lord’s favor, I would have been among the arraigned.”

verses.verseString: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
verses.verseStringB: “We will not die.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: This is the great victory.

verses.verseString: لِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ الْعَامِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: For the like of this let the workers work.

verses.verseString: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
verses.verseStringB: Is this a better hospitality, or the Tree of Bitterness?

verses.verseString: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاهَا فِتْنَةً لِلظَّالِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We made it an ordeal for the unjust.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: It is a tree that grows from the depths of Hellfire.

verses.verseString: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُ رُءُوسُ الشَّيَاطِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Its sprouts are like the devils’ heads.

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Then, on top of it, they will have a boiling brew.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Then their return will be to the Blaze.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا آبَاءَهُمْ ضَالِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: They had found their parents astray.

verses.verseString: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they rushed along in their footsteps.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And most of the ancients before them went astray.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ مُنْذِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Although We had sent warners among them.

verses.verseString: فَانْظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنْذَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: So observe the final fate of those who were warned.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Not so for Allah’s devoted servants.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ نَادَانَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ الْمُجِيبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And Noah called out to Us, and We are the Best of responders.

verses.verseString: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: And We saved him and his family from the great calamity.

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ هُمُ الْبَاقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We made his descendants the survivors.

verses.verseString: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We left mention of him among later generations.

verses.verseString: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Peace be upon Noah, among all people.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We reward the good-doers.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He was one of Our believing servants.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then We drowned the others.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ مِنْ شِيعَتِهِ لَإِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: And of his kind was Abraham.

verses.verseString: إِذْ جَاءَ رَبَّهُ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart.

verses.verseString: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: When he said to his father and his people, “What are you worshiping?

verses.verseString: أَئِفْكًا آلِهَةً دُونَ اللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is it falsified gods, instead of Allah, that you want?

verses.verseString: فَمَا ظَنُّكُمْ بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: What is your opinion about the Lord of the Worlds?”

verses.verseString: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِي النُّجُومِ
verses.verseStringB: Then he took a glance at the stars.

verses.verseString: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: And said, “I am sick.”

verses.verseString: فَتَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But they turned their backs on him, and went away.

verses.verseString: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Then he turned to their gods, and said, “Will you not eat?

verses.verseString: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنْطِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: What is wrong with you, that you do not speak?”

verses.verseString: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًا بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Then he turned on them, striking with the right hand.

verses.verseString: فَأَقْبَلُوا إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they came to him rushing.

verses.verseString: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “Do you worship what you carve?

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: When it is Allah Who created you, and what you manufacture?”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Construct a pyre for him, and throw him into the furnace.”

verses.verseString: فَأَرَادُوا بِهِ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَاهُمُ الْأَسْفَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They desired to scheme against him, so We made them the lowest.

verses.verseString: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And he said, “I am going to my Lord—He will guide me.”

verses.verseString: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.verseStringB: “My Lord, grant me one of the righteous.”

verses.verseString: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِغُلَامٍ حَلِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: So We gave him the good news of a gentle boy.

verses.verseString: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانْظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then, when he became old enough to work with him, he said, “O My son, I see in a dream that I am slaughtering you; so see what you think.” He said, “O my father, do as you are commanded; you will find me, Allah willing, patient.”

verses.verseString: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Then, when they submitted, and he put his forehead down.

verses.verseString: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَنْ يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: We called to him, “O Abraham!

verses.verseString: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: You have fulfilled the vision.” Thus We reward the doers of good.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.verseStringB: That was clearly an obvious test.

verses.verseString: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: And We redeemed him with a great sacrifice.

verses.verseString: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We left with him for later generations.

verses.verseString: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: Peace be upon Abraham.

verses.verseString: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We reward the good-doers.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He was one of Our believing servants.

verses.verseString: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We gave him the good news of Isaac, a prophet from the righteous.

verses.verseString: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And We blessed him, and Isaac. And among their descendants are good-doers. And others who clearly wrong themselves.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And We have favored Moses and Aaron.

verses.verseString: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: And We saved them and their people from the terrible disaster.

verses.verseString: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We supported them, so they became the victors.

verses.verseString: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We gave them the Clarifying Scripture.

verses.verseString: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: And We guided them on the straight path.

verses.verseString: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We left with them for later generations.

verses.verseString: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We reward the righteous.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They were of Our believing servants.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Also, Elijah was one of the messengers.

verses.verseString: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He said to his people, “Do you not fear?

verses.verseString: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Do you call on Baal, and forsake the Best of creators?

verses.verseString: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Allah is your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers.”

verses.verseString: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But they called him a liar, so they will be brought.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Not so for Allah’s chosen servants.

verses.verseString: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We left with him for later generations.

verses.verseString: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Peace be upon the House of Elijah.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We reward the virtuous.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He was one of Our faithful servants.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And Lot was one of the messengers.

verses.verseString: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.verseStringB: When We saved him and his family, all together.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Except for an old woman, who was among the laggards.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then We annihilated the others.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِمْ مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.verseStringB: You pass by them in the morning.

verses.verseString: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And at night. Will you not understand?

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And Jonah was one of the messengers.

verses.verseString: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.verseStringB: When he fled to the overloaded ship.

verses.verseString: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He gambled and lost.

verses.verseString: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Then the whale swallowed him, and he was to blame.

verses.verseString: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Had he not been among those who praised.

verses.verseString: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He would have remained in its belly until the Day they are raised.

verses.verseString: فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Then We threw him into the open, and he was worn out.

verses.verseString: وَأَنْبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِنْ يَقْطِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And We made a grout tree grow over him.

verses.verseString: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Then We sent him to a hundred thousand, or more.

verses.verseString: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment for a while.

verses.verseString: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Ask them, “Are the daughters for your Lord, and the sons for them?”

verses.verseString: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or did We create the angels females, and they were witnesses?”

verses.verseString: أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ مِنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed! It is of their perversions when they say.

verses.verseString: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Allah has begotten.” They are certainly liars.

verses.verseString: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: So He preferred girls over boys?

verses.verseString: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

verses.verseString: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Do you not reflect?

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: Or do you have some compelling proof?

verses.verseString: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then bring your book, if you are truthful.

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they invented a relationship between Him and the jinn. But the jinns know that they will be summoned.

verses.verseString: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Allah be glorified, far above what they describe.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Not so for Allah’s sincere worshipers.

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: You and whatever you worship.

verses.verseString: مَا أَنْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Cannot seduce away from Him.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Except for him who will roast in Hell.

verses.verseString: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَعْلُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: “There is not one of us but has an assigned position.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ
verses.verseStringB: And we are the arrangers.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And we are the glorifiers.”

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Even though they used to say.

verses.verseString: لَوْ أَنَّ عِنْدَنَا ذِكْرًا مِنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: “Had we received advice from the ancients.

verses.verseString: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We would have been of Allah's faithful worshipers.”

verses.verseString: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But they rejected it, so they will soon know.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And Our word already went out to Our servants, the messengers.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنْصُورُونَ
verses.verseStringB: That it is they who will be helped.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ جُنْدَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And Our forces will be the victors.

verses.verseString: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: So turn away from them for a while.

verses.verseString: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And watch them—they will soon see.

verses.verseString: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Do they want Our punishment in a hurry?

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنْذَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: When it descends on their courtyard, miserable will be the morning of those forewarned.

verses.verseString: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: So turn away from them for a while.

verses.verseString: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And watch—they will soon see.

verses.verseString: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Glorified is your Lord—the Lord of Glory—above what they claim!

verses.verseString: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And peace be upon the Messengers.

verses.verseString: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And praise be to Allah, Lord of the Universes.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
verses.verseStringB: Saad. By the Quran, full of reminders.

verses.verseString: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.verseStringB: Those who disbelieve are in arrogance and schism.

verses.verseString: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوْا وَلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.verseStringB: How many generations before them did We destroy? They cried out when it was too late to escape.

verses.verseString: وَعَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.verseStringB: And they marvel that a warner from among them came to them. The disbelievers said, “This is a lying sorcerer.”

verses.verseString: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.verseStringB: “Did he make the gods one God? This is something strange.”

verses.verseString: وَانْطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.verseStringB: And the notables among them announced: “Go on, and hold fast to your gods, this is something planned.

verses.verseString: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
verses.verseStringB: We never heard of this in the former faith. This is nothing but an invention.

verses.verseString: أَأُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِنْ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِنْ ذِكْرِي ۖ بَلْ لَمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
verses.verseStringB: Was the message sent down to him, out of all of us?” In fact, they are doubtful of My message. In fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

verses.verseString: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord's mercy—the Majestic, the Giver?

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَهُمْ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they possess the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend by some means.

verses.verseString: جُنْدٌ مَا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
verses.verseStringB: An army of confederates will be defeated there.

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.verseStringB: Before them, the people of Noah denied; as did Aad, and Pharaoh of the Stakes.

verses.verseString: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
verses.verseStringB: And Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the woods-dwellers: these are the parties.

verses.verseString: إِنْ كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.verseStringB: None of them but denied the messengers, so My punishment was justified.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يَنْظُرُ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَا لَهَا مِنْ فَوَاقٍ
verses.verseStringB: These can expect but a single blast, from which there is no recovery.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّلْ لَنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.verseStringB: And they say, “Our Lord, advance for us our share, before the Day of Account.”

verses.verseString: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.verseStringB: Be patient in the face of what they say, and mention Our servant David, the resourceful. He was obedient.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.verseStringB: We committed the mountains to praise with him, in the evening and at sunrise.

verses.verseString: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.verseStringB: And the birds, flocking together—all obedient to him.

verses.verseString: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
verses.verseStringB: And We strengthened his kingdom, and We gave him wisdom and decisive speech.

verses.verseString: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
verses.verseStringB: Has the story of the two disputants reached you, when they scaled the sanctuary?

verses.verseString: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
verses.verseStringB: When they entered upon David, he was startled by them. They said, “Do not fear. Two disputants: one of us has wronged the other, so judge between us fairly, and do not be biased, and guide us in the right way.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
verses.verseStringB: “This brother of mine has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe. Yet he said, ‘Place it under my care,’ and he pressured me with speech.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.verseStringB: He said, “He has wronged you by asking that your ewe be added to his ewes. And many partners wrong one another, except those who believe and do righteous deeds—but these are so few.” And David realized that We were testing him, so he sought forgiveness from his Lord, fell down kneeling, and repented.

verses.verseString: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.verseStringB: So We forgave him that. And for him is nearness to Us—and a beautiful return.

verses.verseString: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
verses.verseStringB: “O David, We made you a steward over this land, so judge between the people with justice, and do not follow the desire, lest it diverts you from Allah’s path. Those who stray from Allah’s path will have a severe punishment, for having ignored the Day of Account.”

verses.verseString: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: We did not create the heaven and the earth and everything between them in vain. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve—so woe to those who disbelieve because of the Fire.

verses.verseString: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: Or shall We make those who believe and perform righteous deeds like those who work corruption on earth? Or shall We make the reverent like the shameless?

verses.verseString: كِتَابٌ أَنْزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.verseStringB: A blessed Book that We sent down to you, so that they may ponder its Verses, and so that the people of understanding may reflect.

verses.verseString: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.verseStringB: And to David, We gave Solomon—what an excellent servant. He was penitent.

verses.verseString: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
verses.verseStringB: When the beautiful horses were paraded before him in the evening.

verses.verseString: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “I have preferred the love of niceties over the remembrance of my Lord—until they disappeared behind the veil.

verses.verseString: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.verseStringB: Bring them back to me.” And he began caressing their legs and necks.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.verseStringB: And We tested Solomon, and We placed a body on his throne. Then he repented.

verses.verseString: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَا يَنْبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “My Lord, forgive me, and grant me a kingdom never to be attained by anyone after me. You are the Giver.”

verses.verseString: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.verseStringB: So We placed the wind at his service, blowing gently by his command, wherever he wanted.

verses.verseString: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.verseStringB: And the devils—every builder and diver.

verses.verseString: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
verses.verseStringB: And others shackled in chains.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.verseStringB: “This is Our gift. So give generously, or withhold, without an account.”

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.verseStringB: And for him is nearness to Us—and a beautiful resort.

verses.verseString: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.verseStringB: And mention Our servant Job, when he called upon his Lord, “Satan has touched me with distress and suffering.”

verses.verseString: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.verseStringB: “Stomp with your foot—this is cool water to wash with, and to drink.”

verses.verseString: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُمْ مَعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.verseStringB: And We restored his family to him, and their like with them, as a mercy from Us, and a lesson for those who possess insight.

verses.verseString: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِبْ بِهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.verseStringB: “Take with your hand a bundle, and strike with it, and do not break your oath.” We found him patient. What an excellent servant! He was repentant.

verses.verseString: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
verses.verseStringB: And mention Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—endowed with ability and vision.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُمْ بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: We distinguished them with a distinct quality: the remembrance of the Home.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِنْدَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.verseStringB: To Us: they are among the chosen, the outstanding.

verses.verseString: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.verseStringB: And mention Ishmael, Elisha, and Ezekiel: each is among the outstanding.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.verseStringB: This is a reminder. The devout will have a good place of return.

verses.verseString: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُفَتَّحَةً لَهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
verses.verseStringB: The Gardens of Eternity, with the doors, opened for them.

verses.verseString: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.verseStringB: Relaxing in them—and calling for abundant fruit and beverage.

verses.verseString: وَعِنْدَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.verseStringB: And with them will be attendants with a modest gaze, of equal age.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.verseStringB: This is what you are promised for the Day of Account.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِنْ نَفَادٍ
verses.verseStringB: This is Our bounty—inexhaustible.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
verses.verseStringB: All This. But the transgressors will have a miserable return.

verses.verseString: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
verses.verseStringB: Hell—in which they will roast—what a miserable place of return.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.verseStringB: All this. Let them taste it—boiling and bitter cold.

verses.verseString: وَآخَرُ مِنْ شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ
verses.verseStringB: And similar torments of diverse kinds.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُقْتَحِمٌ مَعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: “This is a crowd rushing headlong with you.” No welcome for them. They will be scorched by the Fire.

verses.verseString: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنْتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنْتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “But it is you. No welcome for you. You brought it upon us. What a miserable end.”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَنْ قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us, give him double suffering in the Fire.”

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُمْ مِنَ الْأَشْرَارِ
verses.verseStringB: And they will say, “What is the matter with us, that we do not see men whom we used to count among the wicked?

verses.verseString: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ
verses.verseStringB: Did we take them for mockery? Or did the eyes overlook them?”

verses.verseString: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: This is certainly true—the feuding of the people of the Fire.

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنْذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I am only a warner, and there is no god except Allah—the One, the Conqueror.

verses.verseString: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
verses.verseStringB: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them—the Mighty, the Forgiver.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “It is a message of great importance.

verses.verseString: أَنْتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.verseStringB: From which you are turning away.

verses.verseString: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ بِالْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: I have no knowledge of the Highest Assembly as they dispute.

verses.verseString: إِنْ يُوحَىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلَّا أَنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: It is only revealed to me that I am a clear warner.”

verses.verseString: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي خَالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِنْ طِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Your Lord said to the angels, “I am creating a human being from clay.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِنْ رُوحِي فَقَعُوا لَهُ سَاجِدِينَ
verses.verseStringB: When I have proportioned him, and breathed into him of My spirit, fall down in prostration to him.”

verses.verseString: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So the angels prostrated, all of them together.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ اسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Except for Iblis. He was too proud, and one of the faithless.

verses.verseString: قَالَ يَا إِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَنْ تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الْعَالِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “O Iblis, what prevented you from prostrating before what I created with My Hands? Are you too proud, or are you among the exalted?”

verses.verseString: قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِي مِنْ نَارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِنْ طِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “I am better than he. You created me from fire, and You created him from clay.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “Then get out of here. You are an outcast.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: And My curse is upon you until Judgement Day.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنْظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “My Lord, defer me until the Day they are resurrected.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنْظَرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “You will be deferred.

verses.verseString: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُومِ
verses.verseStringB: Until the Day of the time well-known.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “By Your Majesty, I will seduce them all.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Except for your devoted servants among them.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ فَالْحَقُّ وَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “The truth is, and the truth I say.

verses.verseString: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنْكَ وَمِمَّنْ تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.verseStringB: I will fill Hell with you and with whoever follows you from among them, all together.”
