verses.verseString: لَقَدْ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ الشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنْزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَابَهُمْ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.verseStringB: Allah was pleased with the believers: when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree. He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down Serenity upon them, and He rewarded them with an imminent conquest.

verses.verseString: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: And abundant gains that they will capture. Allah is Mighty and Wise.

verses.verseString: وَعَدَكُمُ اللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَٰذِهِ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِيَ النَّاسِ عَنْكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ آيَةً لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَاطًا مُسْتَقِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: Allah has promised you abundant gains, that you will capture. He has expedited this for you, and He has restrained the people’s hands from you; so that it becomes a sign for the believers, and so that He may guide you to a straight path.

verses.verseString: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ اللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: And others of which you were incapable, Allah has surrounded them. Allah is Capable of all things.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ قَاتَلَكُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوَلَّوُا الْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: If those who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs, then they would have found neither protector nor helper.

verses.verseString: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي قَدْ خَلَتْ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: It is the pattern of Allah, ongoing since the past. You will find no change in Allah’s pattern.

verses.verseString: وَهُوَ الَّذِي كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنْكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُمْ بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِنْ بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: It is He Who restrained their hands from you, and your hands from them, in the valley of Mecca, after having given you the upper hand over them. Allah is Observer of whatever you do.

verses.verseString: هُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْهَدْيَ مَعْكُوفًا أَنْ يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌ مُؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَاءٌ مُؤْمِنَاتٌ لَمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَنْ تَطَئُوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُمْ مِنْهُمْ مَعَرَّةٌ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۖ لِيُدْخِلَ اللَّهُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا لَعَذَّبْنَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: It is they who disbelieved, and barred you from the Sacred Mosque, and prevented the offering from reaching its destination. Were it not for believing men and believing women, whom you did not know, you were about to hurt them, and become guilty unintentionally. Thus Allah admits into His mercy whom He wills. Had they dispersed, We would have punished those who disbelieved among them with a painful punishment.

verses.verseString: إِذْ جَعَلَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِ وَعَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ التَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوا أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: Those who disbelieve filled their hearts with prejudice—the prejudice of the age of ignorance. But Allah sent down His Tranquility upon His Messenger, and upon the believers, and He made binding on them the words of righteousness—to which they were most entitled and most deserving. Allah is Knower of all things.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ صَدَقَ اللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ الرُّؤْيَا بِالْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ الْحَرَامَ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ آمِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا فَجَعَلَ مِنْ دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.verseStringB: Allah has fulfilled His Messenger’s vision in truth: “You will enter the Sacred House, Allah willing, in safety, heads shaven, or hair shortened, not fearing. He knew what you did not know, and has granted besides this an imminent victory.”

verses.verseString: هُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُ بِالْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُ عَلَى الدِّينِ كُلِّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
verses.verseStringB: It is He who sent His Messenger with the guidance and the Religion of Truth, to make it prevail over all religion. And Allah is enough as Witness.

verses.verseString: مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَاهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ مِنْ أَثَرِ السُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِي التَّوْرَاةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِي الْإِنْجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْأَهُ فَآزَرَهُ فَاسْتَغْلَظَ فَاسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِ يُعْجِبُ الزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ الْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنْهُمْ مَغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah. Those with him are firm against the unbelievers, yet kind amongst themselves. You see them kneeling, prostrating, seeking Allah’s blessings and His approval. Their marks are on their faces from the effects of prostration. Such is their example in the Torah, and their example in the Gospel: like a seed that sprouts, becomes strong, grows thick, and rises on its stem, delighting the planters. Through them, He infuriates the unbelievers. Allah has promised those among them who believe and do good works forgiveness and a splendid reward.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: O you who believe! Do not place your opinions above that of Allah and His Messenger, and be conscious of Allah. Allah is Hearing and Knowing.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَرْفَعُوا أَصْوَاتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا لَهُ بِالْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَنْ تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: O you who believe! Do not raise your voices above the Prophet’s voice, nor speak to him loudly, nor address him in the manner you address one another, lest your works be in vain without you realizing.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَاتَهُمْ عِنْدَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ امْتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُمْ مَغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Those who lower their voices in the presence of Allah’s Messenger—they are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for reverence. They will have forgiveness and a great reward.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِنْ وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who call you from behind the apartments—most of them do not understand.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Had they been patient until you came out to them, it would have been better for them. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِنْ جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَنْ تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: O you who believe! If a sinner comes to you with any news, investigate, lest you harm some people out of ignorance, and you become regretful for what you have done.

verses.verseString: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And know that Allah’s Messenger is among you. Had he obeyed you in many issues, you would have suffered hardship. But Allah has endeared the faith to you, and adorned it in your hearts—and He made disbelief, mischief, and rebellion hateful to you—these are the rightly guided.

verses.verseString: فَضْلًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: A Favor and a Blessing from Allah. Allah is Knowing and Wise.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِنْ بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيءَ إِلَىٰ أَمْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِنْ فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And if two groups of believers fight each other, reconcile between them. But if one group aggresses against the other, fight the aggressing group until it complies with Allah’s rule. Once it has complied, reconcile between them with justice, and be equitable. Allah loves the equitable.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The believers are brothers, so reconcile between your brothers, and be mindful of Allah, so you may receive mercy.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِنْ قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰ أَنْ يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِنْ نِسَاءٍ عَسَىٰ أَنْ يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ ۖ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ ۚ وَمَنْ لَمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: O you who believe! No people shall ridicule other people, for they may be better than them. Nor shall any women ridicule other women, for they may be better than they. Nor shall you slander one another, nor shall you insult one another with nicknames. Evil is the return to wickedness after having attained faith. Whoever does not repent—these are the wrongdoers.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَبْ بَعْضُكُمْ بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَنْ يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَحِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: O you who believe! Avoid most suspicion—some suspicion is sinful. And do not spy, nor backbite one another. Would any of you like to eat his dead brother’s flesh? You would hate it. So reverence Allah. Allah is the Acceptor of Repentance, the Mercy-Giver.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُمْ مِنْ ذَكَرٍ وَأُنْثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: O, people! We created you from a male and a female, and We made you races and tribes, so that you may come to know one another. The best among you before Allah is the most righteous. Allah is Knowing and Aware.

verses.verseString: قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا ۖ قُلْ لَمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَٰكِنْ قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِنْ تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُمْ مِنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: The Nomadic-Arabs say, “We have believed.” Say, “You have not believed; but say, ‘We have submitted,’ for faith has not yet entered your hearts. But if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will diminish none of your deeds. Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنْفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger—then do not doubt—and strive with their wealth and their lives in Allah’s way. These are the sincere.

verses.verseString: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “Are you going to teach Allah about your religion, when Allah knows everything in the heavens and on earth, and Allah is Knower of all things?”

verses.verseString: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا ۖ قُلْ لَا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُمْ ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They consider their submission a favor to you. Say, “Do not consider your submission a favor to me. It is Allah who has done you a favor, by guiding you to the faith—if you are truthful.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Allah knows the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and Allah sees whatever you do.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: Qaf. By the Glorious Quran.

verses.verseString: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.verseStringB: They marveled that a warner has come to them from among them. The disbelievers say, “This is something strange.

verses.verseString: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: When we have died and become dust? This is a farfetched return.”

verses.verseString: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنْقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِنْدَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.verseStringB: We know what the earth consumes of them, and with Us is a comprehensive book.

verses.verseString: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَرِيجٍ
verses.verseStringB: But they denied the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a state of confusion.

verses.verseString: أَفَلَمْ يَنْظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِنْ فُرُوجٍ
verses.verseStringB: Have they not observed the sky above them: how We constructed it and decorated it, and it has no cracks?

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنْبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.verseStringB: And the earth, how We spread it out, and We set mountains on it, and We made every beautiful pair grow in it?

verses.verseString: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُنِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: An observation and a reminder for every repenting worshiper.

verses.verseString: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُبَارَكًا فَأَنْبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: And We sent down from the sky blessed water, and We grew with it gardens and grains for harvest.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَهَا طَلْعٌ نَضِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And the soaring palms, with layered clusters.

verses.verseString: رِزْقًا لِلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.verseStringB: As sustenance for the servants. And We revive with it a dead land. Likewise is the emergence.

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.verseStringB: Before them, the people of Noah denied, as did the dwellers of Russ, and Thamood.

verses.verseString: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.verseStringB: And Aad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot.

verses.verseString: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: And the Woods-Dwellers, and the people of Tubba. They all rejected the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

verses.verseString: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: Were We fatigued by the first creation? But they are in doubt about a new creation.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: We created the human being, and We know what his soul whispers to him. We are closer to him than his jugular vein.

verses.verseString: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: As the two receivers receive, seated to the right and to the left.

verses.verseString: مَا يَلْفِظُ مِنْ قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Not a word does he utter, without an observer beside him ready.

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنْتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: And the daze of death has come in truth: “This is what you were trying to evade.”

verses.verseString: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: And the Trumpet is blown: “This is the Promised Day.”

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And every soul comes, with it a driver and a witness.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ كُنْتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِنْ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنْكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: “You were negligent of this, so We lifted your screen from you, and your vision today is sharp.”

verses.verseString: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And His escort will say, “This is what I have ready.”

verses.verseString: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever.

verses.verseString: مَنَّاعٍ لِلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُرِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: Preventer of good, aggressor, doubter.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: Who fabricated another god with Allah; so toss him into the intense agony.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَٰكِنْ كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: His escort will say, “Our Lord, I did not make him rebel, but he was far astray.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُمْ بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: He will say, “Do not feud in My presence—I have warned you in advance.

verses.verseString: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِلْعَبِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: The word will not be changed with Me, and I am not unjust to the servants.”

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِنْ مَزِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when We say to Hell, “Are you full?” And it says, “Are there any more?”

verses.verseString: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: And Paradise will be brought near for the righteous—not far away.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.verseStringB: “This is what you were promised—for every careful penitent.

verses.verseString: مَنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُنِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: Who inwardly feared the Compassionate, and came with a repentant heart.

verses.verseString: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.verseStringB: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity.”

verses.verseString: لَهُمْ مَا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: In it, they will have whatever they desire—and with Us is even more.

verses.verseString: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُمْ بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِنْ مَحِيصٍ
verses.verseStringB: How many generations before them did We destroy, who were more powerful than they? They explored the lands—was there any escape?

verses.verseString: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَنْ كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: In this is a reminder for whoever possesses a heart, or cares to listen and witness.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِنْ لُغُوبٍ
verses.verseStringB: We created the heavens and the earth and everything between them in six stages, and no fatigue touched Us.

verses.verseString: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.verseStringB: So endure what they say, and proclaim the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun, and before sunset.

verses.verseString: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.verseStringB: And glorify Him during the night, and after the prostrations.

verses.verseString: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِنْ مَكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: And listen for the Day when the Caller calls from a nearby place.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when they hear the Shout in Truth. This is the Day of Emergence.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: It is We Who give life and cause death. And to Us, is the destination.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when the earth breaks open from them quickly. That is an easy gathering for Us.

verses.verseString: نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَنْ يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: We are fully aware of what they say, and you are not a dictator over them. So remind with the Quran whoever fears My warning.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.verseStringB: By the spreaders spreading.

verses.verseString: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And by the carriers of loads.

verses.verseString: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And by those moving gently.

verses.verseString: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And by the distributors of affairs.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.verseStringB: What you are promised is true.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.verseStringB: Judgment will take place.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
verses.verseStringB: By the sky that is woven.

verses.verseString: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُخْتَلِفٍ
verses.verseStringB: You differ in what you say.

verses.verseString: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.verseStringB: Averted from it is he who is averted.

verses.verseString: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Perish the imposters.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who are dazed in ignorance.

verses.verseString: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: They ask, “When is Judgment Day?”

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The Day they are presented to the Fire.

verses.verseString: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Taste your scheme. This is what you used to challenge.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: But the cautious will be in gardens and springs.

verses.verseString: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Receiving what their Lord has given them. Before this they were virtuous.

verses.verseString: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They used to sleep a little at night.

verses.verseString: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And at dawn, they would pray for pardon.

verses.verseString: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.verseStringB: And in their wealth, there was a rightful share for the beggar and the deprived.

verses.verseString: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And on earth are signs for the convinced.

verses.verseString: وَفِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And within yourselves. Do you not see?

verses.verseString: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And in heaven is your livelihood, and what you are promised.

verses.verseString: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنْطِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: By the Lord of the heaven and the earth, it is as true as you can speak.

verses.verseString: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Did the story of Abraham’s honorable guests reach you?

verses.verseString: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُنْكَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: When they entered his presence, they said, “Peace.” He said, “Peace, strangers.”

verses.verseString: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Then he slipped away to his family, and came with a fattened calf.

verses.verseString: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He placed it close to them, and said, “Will you not eat?”

verses.verseString: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Then he harbored a fear of them. They said, “Do not fear!” And they gave him the good news of a knowledgeable boy.

verses.verseString: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Then His wife came forward screaming, striking her face, and she said, “A barren old woman?”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Thus said your Lord. He is the Wise, the Knowing.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “What is your mission, O envoys?”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “We are sent to a guilty people.”

verses.verseString: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِنْ طِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: “To unleash upon them rocks of clay.”

verses.verseString: مُسَوَّمَةً عِنْدَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.verseStringB: “Marked by your Lord for the excessive.”

verses.verseString: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَنْ كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: So We evacuated all the believers who were in it.

verses.verseString: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But We found in it only one household of Muslims.

verses.verseString: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: And We left a sign in it for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.verseString: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And in Moses, when We sent him to Pharaoh, with compelling proof.

verses.verseString: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.verseStringB: But he turned away with his warlords, and said, “A wizard or a madman.”

verses.verseString: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: So We seized him and his troops, and We threw them into the sea, and He was to blame.

verses.verseString: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: And in Aad, when We unleashed against them the devastating wind.

verses.verseString: مَا تَذَرُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: It spared nothing it came upon—but rendered it like decayed ruins.

verses.verseString: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And in Thamood, when it was said to them, “Enjoy yourselves for a while.”

verses.verseString: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنْظُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But they defied the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt struck them as they looked on.

verses.verseString: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِنْ قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنْتَصِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They were unable to rise, nor could they help one another.

verses.verseString: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And before that, the people of Noah. They were immoral people.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We constructed the universe with power, and We are expanding it.

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And the earth—We spread it out—how well We prepared it!

verses.verseString: وَمِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And of all things, We created two mates, so that you may reflect and ponder.

verses.verseString: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُمْ مِنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: “So flee towards Allah. I am to you from Him a clear warner.”

verses.verseString: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُمْ مِنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: “And do not set up another god with Allah. I am to you from Him a clear warner.”

verses.verseString: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِنْ رَسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.verseStringB: Likewise, no messenger came to those before them, but they said, “A magician or a madman.”

verses.verseString: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Did they recommend it to one another? In fact, they are tyrannical people.

verses.verseString: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنْتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.verseStringB: So turn away from them; you are not to blame.

verses.verseString: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنْفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And remind, as the reminder benefits the believers.

verses.verseString: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنْسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.verseStringB: I did not create jinn and humans except to worship Me.

verses.verseString: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُمْ مِنْ رِزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَنْ يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.verseStringB: I need no livelihood from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
verses.verseStringB: Allah is the Provider, the Possessor of Strength, the Firm.

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Those who do wrong will have their turn, like the turn of their counterparts, so let them not rush Me.

verses.verseString: فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So woe to those who disbelieve from their day which they are promised.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالطُّورِ
verses.verseStringB: By the Mount.

verses.verseString: وَكِتَابٍ مَسْطُورٍ
verses.verseStringB: And a Book inscribed.

verses.verseString: فِي رَقٍّ مَنْشُورٍ
verses.verseStringB: In a published scroll.

verses.verseString: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
verses.verseStringB: And the frequented House.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.verseStringB: And the elevated roof.

verses.verseString: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
verses.verseStringB: And the seething sea.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.verseStringB: Your Lord’s punishment will occur.

verses.verseString: مَا لَهُ مِنْ دَافِعٍ
verses.verseStringB: There is none to prevent it.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the sky sways in agitation.

verses.verseString: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains go into motion.

verses.verseString: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who play with speculation.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.verseStringB: The Day when they are shoved forcefully into the Fire of Gehenna.

verses.verseString: هَٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “This is the Fire that you used to deny.

verses.verseString: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَا أَمْ أَنْتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is this magic, or do you not see?

verses.verseString: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Burn in it. Be patient, or impatient, it is the same for you. You are only being penalized for what you used to do.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: The righteous will be amid Gardens and bliss.

verses.verseString: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord has spared them the suffering of Hell.

verses.verseString: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Eat and drink joyfully, because of what you used to do.

verses.verseString: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُمْ بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Relaxing on arrayed furniture, We will couple them with gorgeous spouses.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُمْ بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُمْ مِنْ عَمَلِهِمْ مِنْ شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: Those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith: We will unite them with their descendants, and We will not deprive them of any of their works. Every person is a hostage to what he has earned.

verses.verseString: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُمْ بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And We will supply them with fruit, and meat, as they desire.

verses.verseString: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: They will pass around a cup which leads to no-nonsense, nor sinfulness.

verses.verseString: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَكْنُونٌ
verses.verseStringB: Circulating among them to serve them will be youths, like hidden pearls.

verses.verseString: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They will approach one another, inquiring.

verses.verseString: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “Before this, we were fearful for our families.

verses.verseString: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
verses.verseStringB: But Allah has blessed us, and He spared us the suffering of the Fiery Winds.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِنْ قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.verseStringB: Before this, we used to pray to Him. He is the Good, the Merciful.”

verses.verseString: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنْتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: So remind. By the grace of your Lord, you are neither an oracle nor a madman.

verses.verseString: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they say, “A poet—we anticipate for him a calamity of time.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُمْ مِنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “Go on waiting; I am waiting with you.”

verses.verseString: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُمْ بِهَٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or is it their dreams compelling them to this? Or are they transgressing people?

verses.verseString: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَلْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they say, “He made it up”? In fact, they have no faith.

verses.verseString: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِثْلِهِ إِنْ كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: So let them produce a discourse like it—if they are truthful.

verses.verseString: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or were they created from nothing? Or are they the creators?

verses.verseString: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَلْ لَا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they are not certain.

verses.verseString: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord? Or are they the controllers?

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُمْ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُبِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they have a stairway by means of which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear proof.

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or for Him the daughters, and for you the sons?

verses.verseString: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُمْ مِنْ مَغْرَمٍ مُثْقَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do you demand payment from them, and they are burdened by debt?

verses.verseString: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they know the future, and they write it down?

verses.verseString: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or are they plotting a conspiracy? The conspiracy will fall back on the unbelievers.

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glory be to Allah, above the partners they ascribe.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَرْكُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: And were they to see a piece of the sky falling, they would say, “A heap of clouds.”

verses.verseString: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So leave them until they meet their Day when they will be stunned.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when their ploys will avail them nothing, and they will not be helped.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: For those who do wrong, there is a punishment besides that, but most of them do not know.

verses.verseString: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.verseStringB: So patiently await your Lord’s decision—you are before Our Eyes. And proclaim your Lord’s praises when you arise.

verses.verseString: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
verses.verseStringB: And glorify Him during the night, and at the receding of the stars.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: By the star, as it falls.

verses.verseString: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Your friend has not strayed, nor has he erred.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يَنْطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Nor does he speak out of desire.

verses.verseString: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: It is, but a revealed revelation.

verses.verseString: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Taught to him by the Extremely Powerful.

verses.verseString: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Possessor of vigor. He settled.

verses.verseString: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: While he was at the highest horizon.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then he drew near, and He hovered around.

verses.verseString: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He was within two bows’ length, or closer.

verses.verseString: فَأَوْحَىٰ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then He revealed to His servant what He revealed.

verses.verseString: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: The heart did not lie about what he saw.

verses.verseString: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Will you dispute with him concerning what he saw?

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He saw him in another descent.

verses.verseString: عِنْدَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنْتَهَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: At the Lote Tree of Extremity.

verses.verseString: عِنْدَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Near which is the Garden of Refuge.

verses.verseString: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: As there covered the Lotus Tree what covered it.

verses.verseString: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: The sight did not waver, nor did it overreach.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He saw some of the Great Signs of his Lord.

verses.verseString: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Have you considered al-Lat and al-Uzza?

verses.verseString: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And Manat, the third one, the other?

verses.verseString: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنْثَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Are you to have the males, and He the females?

verses.verseString: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: What a bizarre distribution.

verses.verseString: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنْتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُمْ مَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِنْ يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنْفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ مِنْ رَبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: These are nothing but names, which you have invented, you and your forefathers—a practice Allah has never authorized. They follow nothing but assumptions, and what the ego desires, although guidance has come to them from their Lord.

verses.verseString: أَمْ لِلْإِنْسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Or is the human being to have whatever he desires?

verses.verseString: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: To Allah belong the Last and the First.

verses.verseString: وَكَمْ مِنْ مَلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِنْ بَعْدِ أَنْ يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: How many an angel is there in the heavens whose intercession avails nothing, except after Allah gives permission to whomever He wills, and approves?

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنْثَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels with female names.

verses.verseString: وَمَا لَهُمْ بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِنْ يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
verses.verseStringB: They have no knowledge of it. They follow nothing but assumptions, and assumptions are no substitute for the truth.

verses.verseString: فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْ مَنْ تَوَلَّىٰ عَنْ ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.verseStringB: So avoid whoever has turned away from Our remembrance, and desires nothing but the present life.

verses.verseString: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُمْ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ ضَلَّ عَنْ سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: That is the extent of their knowledge. Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His path, and He knows best who has accepted guidance.

verses.verseString: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
verses.verseStringB: To Allah belongs whatever is in Heaven and whatever is on Earth. He will penalize those who commit evil according to their deeds. And He will reward those who do good with the best.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنْشَأَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنْتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Those who avoid major sins and indecencies—except what is slight—your Lord is of Vast Forgiveness. He knew you well, ever since He produced you from the earth, and ever since you were embryos in your mothers’ wombs. So do not acclaim your own virtue; He is fully aware of the righteous.

verses.verseString: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Have you considered him who turned away?

verses.verseString: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And gave a little, and then withheld?

verses.verseString: أَعِنْدَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Does he possess knowledge of the unseen, and can therefore foresee?

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Or was he not informed of what is in the Scrolls of Moses?

verses.verseString: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And of Abraham, who fulfilled?

verses.verseString: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: That no bearer of burdens bears the burdens of another.

verses.verseString: وَأَنْ لَيْسَ لِلْإِنْسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that the human being attains only what he strives for.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that his efforts will be witnessed.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنْتَهَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that to your Lord is the finality.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that it is He who causes laughter and weeping.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.verseStringB: And that it is He who causes death and gives life.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that it is He who created the two types—the male and the female.

verses.verseString: مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: From a drop when ejected.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that upon Him lies the second genesis.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that it is He who enriches and impoverishes.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that it is He who is Lord of Sirius.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And that it is He who destroyed Aad the Former.

verses.verseString: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And Thamood, sparing none.

verses.verseString: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And the people of Noah aforetime; for they were most unjust and most oppressive.

verses.verseString: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And He razed the overthrown cities.

verses.verseString: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And He covered them with whatever covered them.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord's marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: This is a warning, just like the previous warnings.

verses.verseString: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
verses.verseStringB: The imminent has drawn near.

verses.verseString: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: None besides Allah can unveil it.

verses.verseString: أَفَمِنْ هَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Do you marvel at this discourse?

verses.verseString: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And laugh, and do not weep?

verses.verseString: وَأَنْتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Lost in your frivolity?

verses.verseString: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
verses.verseStringB: So bow down to Allah—and worship!

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانْشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.verseStringB: The Hour has drawn near, and the moon has split.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.verseStringB: Yet whenever they see a sign, they turn away, and say, “Continuous magic.”

verses.verseString: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.verseStringB: They lied and followed their desires, but everything has its time.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ مِنَ الْأَنْبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.verseStringB: And there came to them news containing deterrent.

verses.verseString: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.verseStringB: Profound wisdom—but warnings are of no avail.

verses.verseString: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُكُرٍ
verses.verseStringB: So turn away from them. On the Day when the Caller calls to something terrible.

verses.verseString: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُنْتَشِرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Their eyes downcast, they will emerge from the graves, as if they were swarming locusts.

verses.verseString: مُهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Scrambling towards the Caller. The unbelievers will say, “This is a difficult Day.”

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.verseStringB: The people of Noah denied before them. They rejected Our servant, and said, “Possessed!,” and he was intimidated.

verses.verseString: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانْتَصِرْ
verses.verseStringB: So he appealed to his Lord, “I am overwhelmed, so help me.”

verses.verseString: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُنْهَمِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: So We opened the gates of heaven, with water pouring down.

verses.verseString: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.verseStringB: And We made the earth burst with springs, and the waters joined for a purpose already destined.

verses.verseString: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.verseStringB: And We carried him on a craft of planks and nails.

verses.verseString: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِمَنْ كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.verseStringB: Sailing before Our eyes—a reward for him who was rejected.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ تَرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: And We left it as a sign. Is there anyone who would be mindful?

verses.verseString: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: So how were My punishment and My warnings?

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: We made the Quran easy to learn. Is there anyone who would learn?

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: Aad denied the truth. So how were My punishment and My warnings?

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.verseStringB: We unleashed upon them a screaming wind, on a day of unrelenting misery.

verses.verseString: تَنْزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُنْقَعِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: Plucking people away, as if they were uprooted palm trunks.

verses.verseString: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: So how were My punishment and My warnings?

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: We made the Quran easy to remember. Is there anyone who would remember?

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: Thamood rejected the warnings.

verses.verseString: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِنَّا وَاحِدًا نَتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Shall we follow a single human being from among us? Then we would be misguided and insane.

verses.verseString: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Was the message given to him, out of all of us? In fact, he is a wicked liar.”

verses.verseString: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.verseStringB: They will know tomorrow who the wicked liar is.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.verseStringB: We are sending the female camel as a test for them. So watch them, and be patient.

verses.verseString: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُحْتَضَرٌ
verses.verseStringB: And inform them that the water is to be divided among them—each share of drink equitably proportioned.

verses.verseString: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.verseStringB: But they called their friend, and he dared, and he slaughtered.

verses.verseString: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: So how were My punishment and My warnings?

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.verseStringB: We sent against them a single Scream, and they were like crushed hay.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: We made the Quran easy to understand. Is there anyone who would understand?

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: The people of Lot denied the warnings.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَجَّيْنَاهُمْ بِسَحَرٍ
verses.verseStringB: We unleashed on them a shower of stones, except for Lot’s family; We rescued them at dawn.

verses.verseString: نِعْمَةً مِنْ عِنْدِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَنْ شَكَرَ
verses.verseStringB: As a blessing from Us. Thus We reward the thankful.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ أَنْذَرَهُمْ بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: And he had warned them of Our onslaught, but they dismissed the warnings.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَنْ ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: They even lusted for his guest, so We obliterated their eyes. “So taste My punishment and My warnings.”

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُمْ بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.verseStringB: Early morning brought upon them lasting punishment.

verses.verseString: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.verseStringB: So taste My punishment and My warnings.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: We made the Quran easy to memorize. Is there anyone who would memorize?

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.verseStringB: The warnings also came to the people of Pharaoh.

verses.verseString: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُقْتَدِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: They denied Our signs, all of them. So We seized them with the seizure of an Almighty Omnipotent.

verses.verseString: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِنْ أُولَٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُمْ بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.verseStringB: Are your unbelievers better than these? Or do you have some exemption in the scriptures?

verses.verseString: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُنْتَصِرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they say, “We are united, and we will be victorious”?

verses.verseString: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.verseStringB: The multitude will be defeated, and they will turn their backs.

verses.verseString: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.verseStringB: The Hour is their appointed time—the Hour is most catastrophic and most bitter.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.verseStringB: The guilty are in confusion and madness.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when they are dragged into the Fire on their faces: “Taste the touch of Saqar.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.verseStringB: Everything We created is in precise measure.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.verseStringB: And Our command is only once, like the blink of an eye.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُدَّكِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: And We have destroyed the likes of you. Is there anyone who would ponder?

verses.verseString: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.verseStringB: Everything they have done is in the Records.

verses.verseString: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُسْتَطَرٌ
verses.verseStringB: Everything, small and big, is written down.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.verseStringB: The righteous will be amidst Gardens and rivers.

verses.verseString: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِنْدَ مَلِيكٍ مُقْتَدِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: In an assembly of truth, in the presence of an Omnipotent King.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: الرَّحْمَٰنُ
verses.verseStringB: The Compassionate.

verses.verseString: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
verses.verseStringB: Has taught the Quran.

verses.verseString: خَلَقَ الْإِنْسَانَ
verses.verseStringB: He created the human being.

verses.verseString: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
verses.verseStringB: And taught him clear expression.

verses.verseString: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.verseStringB: The sun and the moon—by calculations.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.verseStringB: And the stars and the trees prostrate.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
verses.verseStringB: And the sky, He raised. And He set up the balance.

verses.verseString: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So do not transgress in the balance.

verses.verseString: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
verses.verseStringB: But maintain the weights with justice. And do not violate the balance.

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.verseStringB: And the earth—He set it up for the creatures.

verses.verseString: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
verses.verseStringB: In it are fruits and date-palms in clusters.

verses.verseString: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
verses.verseStringB: And grains in the blades, and fragrant plants.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: خَلَقَ الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
verses.verseStringB: He created the human being from hard clay, like bricks.

verses.verseString: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِنْ مَارِجٍ مِنْ نَارٍ
verses.verseStringB: And He created the jinn from a fusion of fire.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.verseStringB: Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.verseStringB: He merged the two bodies of water, converging together.

verses.verseString: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.verseStringB: Between them is a barrier that they do not overrun.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا اللُّؤْلُؤُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.verseStringB: From them emerge pearls and coral.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: وَلَهُ الْجَوَارِ الْمُنْشَآتُ فِي الْبَحْرِ كَالْأَعْلَامِ
verses.verseStringB: His are the ships, raised above the sea like landmarks.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
verses.verseStringB: Everyone on it is perishing.

verses.verseString: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.verseStringB: But will remain the Presence of your Lord, Full of Majesty and Splendor.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: يَسْأَلُهُ مَنْ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ
verses.verseStringB: Everyone in the heavens and the earth asks Him. Every day He is managing.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلَانِ
verses.verseStringB: We will attend to you, O burdensome two.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: يَا مَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنْسِ إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَنْ تَنْفُذُوا مِنْ أَقْطَارِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ فَانْفُذُوا ۚ لَا تَنْفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَانٍ
verses.verseStringB: O society of jinn and humans! If you can penetrate beyond the realms of the heavens and the earth, go ahead and penetrate. But you cannot penetrate except with authorization.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِنْ نَارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنْتَصِرَانِ
verses.verseStringB: You will be bombarded with flares of fire and brass, and you will not succeed.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا انْشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَالدِّهَانِ
verses.verseStringB: When the sky splits apart, and it becomes a rose, like paint.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَا يُسْأَلُ عَنْ ذَنْبِهِ إِنْسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.verseStringB: On that day, no human and no jinn will be asked about his sin.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِي وَالْأَقْدَامِ
verses.verseStringB: The guilty will be recognized by their marks; they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: This is Hell that the criminals denied.

verses.verseString: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ
verses.verseStringB: They circulate between it and between a seething bath.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.verseStringB: But for anyone who feared his Lord’s position, there are two Gardens.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: ذَوَاتَا أَفْنَانٍ
verses.verseStringB: Full of varieties.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
verses.verseStringB: In them are two flowing springs.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فِيهِمَا مِنْ كُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ
verses.verseStringB: In them are fruits of every kind, in pairs.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍ بَطَائِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى الْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.verseStringB: Reclining on furnishings lined with brocade, and the fruits of the two Gardens are near at hand.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فِيهِنَّ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنْسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.verseStringB: In them are maidens of modest gaze, untouched before by any human or jinn.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: كَأَنَّهُنَّ الْيَاقُوتُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.verseStringB: As though they were rubies and corals.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
verses.verseStringB: Is the reward of goodness anything except goodness?

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: وَمِنْ دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.verseStringB: And beyond them are two Gardens.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: مُدْهَامَّتَانِ
verses.verseStringB: Deep green.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.verseStringB: In them are two gushing springs.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فِيهِمَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ
verses.verseStringB: In them are fruits, and date-palms, and pomegranates.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَاتٌ حِسَانٌ
verses.verseStringB: In them are good and beautiful ones.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: حُورٌ مَقْصُورَاتٌ فِي الْخِيَامِ
verses.verseStringB: Companions, secluded in the pavilions.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنْسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.verseStringB: Whom no human has touched before, nor Jinn.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.verseStringB: Reclining on green cushions, and exquisite wonders.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.verseStringB: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?

verses.verseString: تَبَارَكَ اسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.verseStringB: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, Full of Majesty and Nobility.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.verseStringB: When the Inevitable occurs.

verses.verseString: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Of its occurrence, there is no denial.

verses.verseString: خَافِضَةٌ رَافِعَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Bringing low, raising high.

verses.verseString: إِذَا رُجَّتِ الْأَرْضُ رَجًّا
verses.verseStringB: When the earth is shaken with a shock.

verses.verseString: وَبُسَّتِ الْجِبَالُ بَسًّا
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains are crushed and crumbled.

verses.verseString: فَكَانَتْ هَبَاءً مُنْبَثًّا
verses.verseStringB: And become scattered dust.

verses.verseString: وَكُنْتُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ثَلَاثَةً
verses.verseStringB: And you become three classes.

verses.verseString: فَأَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.verseStringB: Those on the Right—what of those on the Right?

verses.verseString: وَأَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.verseStringB: And those on the Left—what of those on the Left?

verses.verseString: وَالسَّابِقُونَ السَّابِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And the forerunners, the forerunners.

verses.verseString: أُولَٰئِكَ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: These are the nearest.

verses.verseString: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the Gardens of Bliss.

verses.verseString: ثُلَّةٌ مِنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: A group from the ancients.

verses.verseString: وَقَلِيلٌ مِنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And a few from the latecomers.

verses.verseString: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَوْضُونَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: On jeweled thrones.

verses.verseString: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Reclining on them, facing one another.

verses.verseString: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُخَلَّدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Circulating among them will be eternalized youth.

verses.verseString: بِأَكْوَابٍ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍ مِنْ مَعِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: With goblets, pitchers, and a cup from a flowing spring.

verses.verseString: لَا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنْزِفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Causing them neither headache nor intoxication.

verses.verseString: وَفَاكِهَةٍ مِمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And fruits of their choice.

verses.verseString: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And the meat of birds as they desire.

verses.verseString: وَحُورٌ عِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And lovely companions.

verses.verseString: كَأَمْثَالِ اللُّؤْلُؤِ الْمَكْنُونِ
verses.verseStringB: The likenesses of pristine pearls.

verses.verseString: جَزَاءً بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: A reward for what they used to do.

verses.verseString: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: In it they will hear no nonsense and no accusations.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا قِيلًا سَلَامًا سَلَامًا
verses.verseStringB: But only the greeting: “Peace, peace.”

verses.verseString: وَأَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And those on the Right—what of those on the Right?

verses.verseString: فِي سِدْرٍ مَخْضُودٍ
verses.verseStringB: In lush orchards.

verses.verseString: وَطَلْحٍ مَنْضُودٍ
verses.verseStringB: And sweet-smelling plants.

verses.verseString: وَظِلٍّ مَمْدُودٍ
verses.verseStringB: And extended shade.

verses.verseString: وَمَاءٍ مَسْكُوبٍ
verses.verseStringB: And outpouring water.

verses.verseString: وَفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: And abundant fruit.

verses.verseString: لَا مَقْطُوعَةٍ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Never out of season, and never forbidden.

verses.verseString: وَفُرُشٍ مَرْفُوعَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: And elevated mattresses.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَنْشَأْنَاهُنَّ إِنْشَاءً
verses.verseStringB: We created them of unique creation.

verses.verseString: فَجَعَلْنَاهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا
verses.verseStringB: And made them virgins.

verses.verseString: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: Tender and un-aging.

verses.verseString: لِأَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: For those on the Right.

verses.verseString: ثُلَّةٌ مِنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Many from those of old.

verses.verseString: وَثُلَّةٌ مِنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And many from the latecomers.

verses.verseString: وَأَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ
verses.verseStringB: And those on the Left—what of those on the Left?

verses.verseString: فِي سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Amid scorching wind and boiling water.

verses.verseString: وَظِلٍّ مِنْ يَحْمُومٍ
verses.verseStringB: And a shade of black smoke.

verses.verseString: لَا بَارِدٍ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Neither cool nor refreshing.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Before that, they lived in luxury.

verses.verseString: وَكَانُوا يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى الْحِنْثِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: And they persisted in immense wrongdoing.

verses.verseString: وَكَانُوا يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they used to say, “When we are dead and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected?

verses.verseString: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And our ancestors of old?”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّ الْأَوَّلِينَ وَالْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “Those of old and those of later times.

verses.verseString: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَعْلُومٍ
verses.verseStringB: Will be gathered for the appointment of a familiar Day.”

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا الضَّالُّونَ الْمُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Then you, O misguided deniers.

verses.verseString: لَآكِلُونَ مِنْ شَجَرٍ مِنْ زَقُّومٍ
verses.verseStringB: Will be eating from the Tree of Bitterness.

verses.verseString: فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Will be filling your bellies with it.

verses.verseString: فَشَارِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Will be drinking on top of it boiling water.

verses.verseString: فَشَارِبُونَ شُرْبَ الْهِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Drinking as parched camels drink.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: This is their hospitality on the Day of Retribution.

verses.verseString: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We created you—if only you would believe!

verses.verseString: أَفَرَأَيْتُمْ مَا تُمْنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have you seen what you ejaculate?

verses.verseString: أَأَنْتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is it you who create it, or are We the Creators?

verses.verseString: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ الْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We mandated death among you, and We will not be surpassed.

verses.verseString: عَلَىٰ أَنْ نُبَدِّلَ أَمْثَالَكُمْ وَنُنْشِئَكُمْ فِي مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: In replacing you with your likes, and transforming you into what you do not know.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: You have known the first formation. Then why do you not reflect?

verses.verseString: أَفَرَأَيْتُمْ مَا تَحْرُثُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have you seen what you cultivate?

verses.verseString: أَأَنْتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الزَّارِعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is it you who sow it, or are We the Sowers?

verses.verseString: لَوْ نَشَاءُ لَجَعَلْنَاهُ حُطَامًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: If We will, We can turn it into rubble; then you will lament.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “We are penalized.

verses.verseString: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.verseStringB: No—we have been deprived.”

verses.verseString: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ الْمَاءَ الَّذِي تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have you seen the water that you drink?

verses.verseString: أَأَنْتُمْ أَنْزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ الْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنْزِلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is it you who sent it down from the clouds, or are We the senders?

verses.verseString: لَوْ نَشَاءُ جَعَلْنَاهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: If We will, We can make it bitter. So why are you not thankful?

verses.verseString: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ النَّارَ الَّتِي تُورُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have you seen the fire you kindle?

verses.verseString: أَأَنْتُمْ أَنْشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَا أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنْشِئُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is it you who produce its tree, or are We the Producers?

verses.verseString: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَاهَا تَذْكِرَةً وَمَتَاعًا لِلْمُقْوِينَ
verses.verseStringB: We made it a reminder, and comfort for the users.

verses.verseString: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Great.

verses.verseString: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَاقِعِ النُّجُومِ
verses.verseStringB: I swear by the positions of the stars.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُ لَقَسَمٌ لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: And it is a tremendous oath—if you only knew.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ لَقُرْآنٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: It is a Noble Quran.

verses.verseString: فِي كِتَابٍ مَكْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: In a well-protected Book.

verses.verseString: لَا يَمَسُّهُ إِلَّا الْمُطَهَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: None can grasp it except the purified.

verses.verseString: تَنْزِيلٌ مِنْ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.verseString: أَفَبِهَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَنْتُمْ مُدْهِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Is it this discourse that you take so lightly?

verses.verseString: وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And you make it your livelihood to deny it?

verses.verseString: فَلَوْلَا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ الْحُلْقُومَ
verses.verseStringB: So when it has reached the throat.

verses.verseString: وَأَنْتُمْ حِينَئِذٍ تَنْظُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: While you are looking on.

verses.verseString: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْكُمْ وَلَٰكِنْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: We are closer to it than you are, but you cannot see.

verses.verseString: فَلَوْلَا إِنْ كُنْتُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِينِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Why, then, if you are unconstrained.

verses.verseString: تَرْجِعُونَهَا إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: You do not bring it back, if you are truthful?

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا إِنْ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But if he is one of those brought near.

verses.verseString: فَرَوْحٌ وَرَيْحَانٌ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Then happiness, and fragrance, and Garden of Delights.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا إِنْ كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And if he is among those on the Right.

verses.verseString: فَسَلَامٌ لَكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Then, “Peace upon you,” from those on the Right.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا إِنْ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُكَذِّبِينَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: But if he is among the deniers, the mistaken.

verses.verseString: فَنُزُلٌ مِنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Then a welcome of Inferno.

verses.verseString: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: And burning in Hell.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.verseStringB: This is the absolute truth.
