verses.verseStringB: We tested them, as We tested the owners of the garden—when they vowed to harvest it in the morning.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they made no exception.

verses.verseString: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَائِفٌ مِنْ رَبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَائِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But a disaster from your Lord went around it while they slept.

verses.verseString: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَالصَّرِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: And it became as if picked.

verses.verseString: فَتَنَادَوْا مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.verseStringB: In the morning, they called one another.

verses.verseString: أَنِ اغْدُوا عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَارِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: “Go early to your plantation, if you want to harvest.”

verses.verseString: فَانْطَلَقُوا وَهُمْ يَتَخَافَتُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So they set out, whispering to one another.

verses.verseString: أَنْ لَا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا الْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِسْكِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: “No poor person is to enter it upon you today.”

verses.verseString: وَغَدَوْا عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍ قَادِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And they proceeded early, resolved in intent.

verses.verseString: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوا إِنَّا لَضَالُّونَ
verses.verseStringB: But when they saw it, they said, “We are lost.

verses.verseString: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, we are deprived.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ لَكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The most moderate of them said, “Did I not say to you, ‘if only you would praise?’”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَ رَبِّنَا إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Glory be to our Lord—We were in the wrong.”

verses.verseString: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلَاوَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Then they turned to one another, blaming one another.

verses.verseString: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا إِنَّا كُنَّا طَاغِينَ
verses.verseStringB: They said, “Woe to us—we were domineering.

verses.verseString: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَا أَنْ يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِنْهَا إِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَاغِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Perhaps our Lord will give us a better substitute for it. We are turning to our Lord in hope .”

verses.verseString: كَذَٰلِكَ الْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ الْآخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Such is the punishment. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater—if they only knew.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: For the righteous are Gardens of Delight with their Lord.

verses.verseString: أَفَنَجْعَلُ الْمُسْلِمِينَ كَالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Shall We treat the submitters like the villains?

verses.verseString: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَابٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do you have a scripture in which you study?

verses.verseString: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: That you will have in it whatever you choose?

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَانٌ عَلَيْنَا بَالِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do you have oaths from Us, binding until Resurrection Day, that whatever you demand is yours?

verses.verseString: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Ask them, which of them will guarantee that!

verses.verseString: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَاءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا بِشُرَكَائِهِمْ إِنْ كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners—if they are truthful.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَنْ سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى السُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the Shin will be exposed, and they will be called to bow down, but they will be unable.

verses.verseString: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى السُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَالِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Their eyes subdued, covered with shame. They were invited to prostrate when they were sound.

verses.verseString: فَذَرْنِي وَمَنْ يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُمْ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So leave Me to those who reject this message. We will proceed against them gradually, from where they do not know.

verses.verseString: وَأُمْلِي لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِي مَتِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And I will give them time. My plan is firm.

verses.verseString: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُمْ مِنْ مَغْرَمٍ مُثْقَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or are you asking them for a fee, so they are burdened with debt?

verses.verseString: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Or do they know the future, and so they write it down?

verses.verseString: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُنْ كَصَاحِبِ الْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: So be patient with your Lord’s Judgment. And do not be like the Fellow of the Whale who cried out in despair.

verses.verseString: لَوْلَا أَنْ تَدَارَكَهُ نِعْمَةٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِ لَنُبِذَ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: Had the blessing from his Lord not reached him, he would have been thrown onto the barren shore, and he was blamed.

verses.verseString: فَاجْتَبَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَجَعَلَهُ مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But his Lord chose him, and He made him of the righteous.

verses.verseString: وَإِنْ يَكَادُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَارِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا الذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.verseStringB: Those who disbelieve almost stab you with their glances when they hear the message, and they say, “He is crazy!”

verses.verseString: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But it is only a reminder for humankind.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: الْحَاقَّةُ
verses.verseStringB: The Reality.

verses.verseString: مَا الْحَاقَّةُ
verses.verseStringB: What is the Reality?

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحَاقَّةُ
verses.verseStringB: What will make you understand what the Reality is?

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌ بِالْقَارِعَةِ
verses.verseStringB: Thamood and Aad denied the Catastrophe.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا بِالطَّاغِيَةِ
verses.verseStringB: As for Thamood, they were annihilated by the Overwhelming.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: And as for Aad, they were annihilated by a furious, roaring wind.

verses.verseString: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَانِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى الْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: He unleashed it against them for seven nights and eight days, in succession. You could see the people tossed around, as if they were hollow palm trunks.

verses.verseString: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُمْ مِنْ بَاقِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Can you see any remnant of them?

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَنْ قَبْلَهُ وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَاتُ بِالْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.verseStringB: Then came Pharaoh, and those before him, and the Overturned Cities indulged in sin.

verses.verseString: فَعَصَوْا رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَابِيَةً
verses.verseStringB: They disobeyed their Lord's messenger, so He seized them with a devastating grip.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَى الْمَاءُ حَمَلْنَاكُمْ فِي الْجَارِيَةِ
verses.verseStringB: When the waters overflowed, We carried you in the cruising Ark.

verses.verseString: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَا أُذُنٌ وَاعِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: To make it a lesson for you—and so that retaining ears may retain it.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Then, when the Trumpet is blown, a single blow.

verses.verseString: وَحُمِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَاحِدَةً
verses.verseStringB: And the earth and the mountains are lifted, and crushed with a single blow.

verses.verseString: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, the Inevitable will come to pass.

verses.verseString: وَانْشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَهِيَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And the sky will crack. On that Day, it will be frail.

verses.verseString: وَالْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰ أَرْجَائِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَانِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And the angels will be ranged around its borders, while on that day eight will be carrying your Lord’s throne above them.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنْكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, you will be exposed, and no secret of yours will remain hidden.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ فَيَقُولُ هَاؤُمُ اقْرَءُوا كِتَابِيَهْ
verses.verseStringB: As for him who is given his book in his right hand, he will say, “Here, take my book and read it.

verses.verseString: إِنِّي ظَنَنْتُ أَنِّي مُلَاقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.verseStringB: I knew I would be held accountable.”

verses.verseString: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَاضِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: So he will be in pleasant living.

verses.verseString: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: In a lofty Garden.

verses.verseString: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Its pickings are within reach.

verses.verseString: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِي الْأَيَّامِ الْخَالِيَةِ
verses.verseStringB: “Eat and drink merrily for what you did in days gone by.”

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِشِمَالِهِ فَيَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَابِيَهْ
verses.verseStringB: But as for him who is given his book in his left hand, he will say, “I wish I was never given my book.

verses.verseString: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.verseStringB: And never knew what my account was.

verses.verseString: يَا لَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ الْقَاضِيَةَ
verses.verseStringB: I wish it was the end.

verses.verseString: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّي مَالِيَهْ ۜ
verses.verseStringB: My money did not avail me.

verses.verseString: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلْطَانِيَهْ
verses.verseStringB: My power has vanished from me.”

verses.verseString: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
verses.verseStringB: “Take him and shackle him.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ الْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then scorch him in the Blaze.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ فِي سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَاسْلُكُوهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then in a chain whose length is seventy cubits, tie him up.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: For he would not believe in Allah, the Great.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Nor would he advocate the feeding of the destitute.

verses.verseString: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ الْيَوْمَ هَاهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: So he has no friend here today.

verses.verseString: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And no food, except scum.

verses.verseString: لَا يَأْكُلُهُ إِلَّا الْخَاطِئُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Which none will eat, except the sinners.”

verses.verseString: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So I swear by what you see.

verses.verseString: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And by what you do not see.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: It is the speech of a noble messenger.

verses.verseString: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And it is not the speech of a poet—little do you believe.

verses.verseString: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Nor is it the speech of a fortune-teller. Little do you reflect.

verses.verseString: تَنْزِيلٌ مِنْ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ الْأَقَاوِيلِ
verses.verseStringB: Had he falsely attributed some statements to Us.

verses.verseString: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: We would have seized him by the right arm.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ الْوَتِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then slashed his lifeline.

verses.verseString: فَمَا مِنْكُمْ مِنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَاجِزِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And none of you could have restrained Us from him.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And it is a reminder for the righteous.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنْكُمْ مُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And We know that some of you will deny it.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And it is a source of regret for the unbelievers.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Yet it is the truth of certainty.

verses.verseString: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Magnificent.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: سَأَلَ سَائِلٌ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
verses.verseStringB: A questioner asked about the impending punishment.

verses.verseString: لِلْكَافِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُ دَافِعٌ
verses.verseStringB: For the disbelievers—to be repelled by none.

verses.verseString: مِنَ اللَّهِ ذِي الْمَعَارِجِ
verses.verseStringB: From Allah, Lord of the ascending ways.

verses.verseString: تَعْرُجُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِي يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: To Him ascend the angels and the Spirit on a Day whose duration is fifty thousand years.

verses.verseString: فَاصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: So be patient, with beautiful patience.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُ بَعِيدًا
verses.verseStringB: They see it distant.

verses.verseString: وَنَرَاهُ قَرِيبًا
verses.verseStringB: But We see it near.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ السَّمَاءُ كَالْمُهْلِ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the sky becomes like molten brass.

verses.verseString: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains become like tufted wool.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يَسْأَلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: No friend will ask about a friend.

verses.verseString: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ الْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِي مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish he could be redeemed from the punishment of that Day by his children.

verses.verseString: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَأَخِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: And his spouse, and his brother.

verses.verseString: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ الَّتِي تُؤْوِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: And his family that sheltered him.

verses.verseString: وَمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنْجِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: And everyone on earth altogether, just to save him.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: By no means! It is a Raging Flame.

verses.verseString: نَزَّاعَةً لِلشَّوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: It strips away the scalps.

verses.verseString: تَدْعُو مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: It invites him who once turned his back and fled.

verses.verseString: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And accumulated and hoarded.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.verseStringB: The human being was created anxious.

verses.verseString: إِذَا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
verses.verseStringB: Touched by adversity, he is fretful.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ الْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
verses.verseStringB: Touched by good, he is ungenerous.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: Except for the prayerful.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَائِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who are constant in their prayers.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ فِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَعْلُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: And those in whose wealth is a rightful share.

verses.verseString: لِلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.verseStringB: For the beggar and the deprived.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: And those who affirm the Day of Judgment.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ مِنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِمْ مُشْفِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And those who dread their Lord’s punishment.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: Their Lord’s punishment is not to be taken for granted.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And those who guard their private parts.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Except from their spouses, or those living under their control, for then they are blameless.

verses.verseString: فَمَنِ ابْتَغَىٰ وَرَاءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْعَادُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But whoever seeks beyond that—these are the transgressors.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَانَاتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَاعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And those who observe their trusts and their promises.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ بِشَهَادَاتِهِمْ قَائِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And those who uphold their testimony.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And those who are dedicated to their prayers.

verses.verseString: أُولَٰئِكَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ مُكْرَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: These will be honored in Gardens.

verses.verseString: فَمَالِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
verses.verseStringB: What is with those who disbelieve, scrambling towards you?

verses.verseString: عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
verses.verseStringB: From the right, and from the left, in droves?

verses.verseString: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ أَنْ يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Is every one of them aspiring to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُمْ مِمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed! We created them from what they know.

verses.verseString: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: I swear by the Lord of the Easts and the Wests, that We are Capable.

verses.verseString: عَلَىٰ أَنْ نُبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Of replacing them with what is better than they, and We are not to be surpassed.

verses.verseString: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا وَيَلْعَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So leave them to blunder and play, until they meet their Day which they are promised.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when they will emerge from the graves in a rush, as if they were racing to a target.

verses.verseString: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Their eyes downcast, overwhelmed by disgrace. This is the Day which they were promised.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنْذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: We sent Noah to his people: “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes upon them.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “O my people, I am a clear warner to you.

verses.verseString: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Worship Allah, and reverence Him, and obey me.

verses.verseString: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ مِنْ ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He will forgive you of your sins, and He will delay you until a stated time. Allah’s time cannot be postponed once it has arrived—if you only knew.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.verseStringB: He said, “My Lord, I have called my people night and day.

verses.verseString: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.verseStringB: But my call added only to their flight.

verses.verseString: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.verseStringB: And whenever I called them to Your forgiveness, they thrust their fingers into their ears, and wrapped themselves with their clothes, and insisted, and became more and more arrogant.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Then I called them openly.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنْتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately.

verses.verseString: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: I said, ‘Ask your Lord for forgiveness; He is Forgiving.

verses.verseString: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِدْرَارًا
verses.verseStringB: He will let loose the sky upon you in abundant rain.

verses.verseString: وَيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
verses.verseStringB: And will supply you with wealth and children, and will give you gardens, and will give you rivers.

verses.verseString: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.verseStringB: What is the matter with you, that you do not hope for Allah with dignity?

verses.verseString: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Although He created you in stages.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.verseStringB: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens in layers?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: And He placed the moon in their midst for light, and He made the sun a lamp.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ أَنْبَتَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: And Allah germinated you from the earth like plants.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: Then He will return you into it, and He will bring you out again.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.verseStringB: And Allah made the earth a spread for you.

verses.verseString: لِتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: So that you may travel its diverse roadways.’”

verses.verseString: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَنْ لَمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Noah said, “My Lord, they have defied me, and followed him whose wealth and children increase him only in loss.”

verses.verseString: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: And they schemed outrageous schemes.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And they said, “Do not give up your gods; do not give up Wadd, nor Souwa, nor Yaghoos, Yaooq, and Nassr.

verses.verseString: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
verses.verseStringB: They have misled many, so increase the wrongdoers only in confusion.”

verses.verseString: مِمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنْصَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Because of their wrongs, they were drowned, then hurled into a Fire, and they found none to help them against Allah.

verses.verseString: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: And Noah said, “My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever on earth.

verses.verseString: إِنَّكَ إِنْ تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: If You leave them, they will mislead your worshipers, and breed nothing but immoral unbelievers.

verses.verseString: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
verses.verseStringB: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my home in faith, and the believing men and believing women, and do not increase the wrongdoers except in ruin.”

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “It was revealed to me that a group of jinn listened in, and said, ‘We have heard a wondrous Recitation.

verses.verseString: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَنْ نُشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: It guides to sound judgment, so we have believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And He—exalted be the Grandeur of our Lord—never had a spouse, nor a child.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.verseStringB: But the fools among us used to say nonsense about Allah.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ تَقُولَ الْإِنْسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.verseStringB: And we had thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِنَ الْإِنْسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.verseStringB: And some individual humans used to seek power through some individual jinn, but they only increased them in confusion.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنْتُمْ أَنْ لَنْ يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And they thought, as you thought, that Allah would resurrect no one.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.verseStringB: And we probed the heaven, and we found it filled with fierce guards and projectiles.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَنْ يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَصَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And we used to take up positions to listen in, but whoever listens now finds a flare lying in wait for him.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And we do not know whether ill is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends guidance for them.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And among us are the righteous, but some of us are otherwise. We follow divergent paths.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ نُعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَنْ نُعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
verses.verseStringB: And we knew for certain that we could never thwart Allah on earth; nor could we ever thwart Him by fleeing.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.verseStringB: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord fears neither denial nor burden.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And among us are the submitters, and among us are the deviant. As for those who have submitted—it is they who have attained Right Guidance.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.verseStringB: But as for the unjust—they will be fuel for Hell.’”

verses.verseString: وَأَنْ لَوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُمْ مَاءً غَدَقًا
verses.verseStringB: And had they kept true to the Path, We would have given them abundant water to drink.

verses.verseString: لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يُعْرِضْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.verseStringB: To test them with it. Whoever turns away from his Lord's remembrance, He will direct him to torment ever mounting.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And the places of worship are for Allah. So do not call, besides Allah, upon anyone else.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And when Allah's servant stood up calling on Him, they almost fell on him in a mass.

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I pray only to my Lord, and I never associate anyone with Him.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “It is not in my power to harm you, nor to bring you to right conduct.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنِّي لَنْ يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “None will protect me from Allah; and I will find no refuge, except in Him.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Except for a proclamation from Allah and His messages. Whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger—for him is the Fire of Hell, remaining in it forever.”

verses.verseString: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Until, when they see what they were promised, they will know who is weaker in helpers, and fewer in number.

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I do not know whether what you are promised is near, or if my Lord will extend it for a period.”

verses.verseString: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: The Knower of the invisible; He does not disclose His Unseen to anyone.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِنْ رَسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards in front of him, and behind him.

verses.verseString: لِيَعْلَمَ أَنْ قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
verses.verseStringB: So that He may know that they have conveyed their Lord’s message. He surrounds whatsoever is with them, and He has tallied everything by number.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.verseStringB: O you Enwrapped.

verses.verseString: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: Stand vigil at night, except a little.

verses.verseString: نِصْفَهُ أَوِ انْقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: Half of it, or reduce it a little.

verses.verseString: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: Or add to it—and recite the Quran slowly and rhythmically.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: We are about to give you a heavy message.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: The vigil of the night is more effective—and more conducive to recitation.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: In the daytime, you have long work to do.

verses.verseString: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: So remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.

verses.verseString: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: Lord of the East and the West. There is no god except He, so take Him as a Trustee.

verses.verseString: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: And patiently endure what they say, and withdraw from them politely.

verses.verseString: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: And leave to Me the deniers—those of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنْكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: With Us are shackles, and a Fierce Fire.

verses.verseString: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: And food that chokes, and painful punishment.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَهِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the earth and the mountains tremble, and the mountains become heaps of sand.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.verseStringB: We sent to you a messenger, a witness over you, as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

verses.verseString: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: But Pharaoh disobeyed the Messenger, so We seized him with a crushing seizing.

verses.verseString: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِنْ كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.verseStringB: So how will you, if you persist in unbelief, save yourself from a Day which will turn the children gray-haired?

verses.verseString: السَّمَاءُ مُنْفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.verseStringB: The sky will shatter thereby. His promise is always fulfilled.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: This is a reminder. So whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِنْ ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَنْ لَنْ تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَنْ سَيَكُونُ مِنْكُمْ مَرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِنْ فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: Your Lord knows that you stand vigil nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it, or third of it, along with a group of those with you. Allah determines the night and the day. He knows that you will be unable to sustain it, so He has relented towards you. So read of the Quran what is easy for you. He knows that some of you may be ill; and others traveling through the land, seeking Allah’s bounty; and others fighting in Allah’s way. So read of it what is easy for you, and perform the prayer, and give the purifying charity, and lend Allah a loan of goodness. Whatever good you advance for yourselves, you will find it with Allah, improved and greater in reward. And ask Allah for forgiveness—Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.verseStringB: O you covered up.

verses.verseString: قُمْ فَأَنْذِرْ
verses.verseStringB: Arise and warn.

verses.verseString: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.verseStringB: And glorify your Lord.

verses.verseString: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.verseStringB: And purify your clothes.

verses.verseString: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.verseStringB: And abandon abominations.

verses.verseString: وَلَا تَمْنُنْ تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.verseStringB: And show no favor, seeking gain.

verses.verseString: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.verseStringB: And be constant for your Lord.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.verseStringB: When the Trumpet is sounded.

verses.verseString: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: That Day will be a difficult day.

verses.verseString: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.verseStringB: For the disbelievers—not easy.

verses.verseString: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.verseStringB: Leave Me alone to him whom I created.

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَمْدُودًا
verses.verseStringB: And gave him vast wealth.

verses.verseString: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.verseStringB: And children as witnesses.

verses.verseString: وَمَهَّدْتُ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.verseStringB: And smoothed things for him.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.verseStringB: Yet he desires that I should add more.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.verseStringB: By no means! He was stubborn towards Our revelations.

verses.verseString: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.verseStringB: I will exhaust him increasingly.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.verseStringB: He thought and analyzed.

verses.verseString: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.verseStringB: May he perish, how he analyzed.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.verseStringB: Again: may he perish, how he analyzed.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.verseStringB: Then he looked.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.verseStringB: Then he frowned and whined.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.verseStringB: Then he turned his back and was proud.

verses.verseString: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.verseStringB: And said, “This is nothing but magic from the past.

verses.verseString: إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.verseStringB: This is nothing but the word of a human being.”

verses.verseString: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.verseStringB: I will roast him in Saqar.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.verseStringB: But what will explain to you what Saqar is?

verses.verseString: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.verseStringB: It neither leaves nor spares.

verses.verseString: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.verseStringB: It scorches the skin.

verses.verseString: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.verseStringB: Over it are Nineteen.

verses.verseString: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.verseStringB: We have appointed none but angels as wardens of the Fire; and We caused their number to be a stumbling block for those who disbelieve; so that those given the Scripture may attain certainty; and those who believe may increase in faith; and those given the Scripture and the believers may not doubt; and those in whose hearts is sickness and the unbelievers may say, “What did Allah intend by this parable?” Thus Allah leads astray whom He wills, and He guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except He. And it is but a reminder to the humans.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.verseStringB: But no! By the moon.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.verseStringB: And the night as it retreats.

verses.verseString: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.verseStringB: And the morning as it brightens.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.verseStringB: It is one of the greatest.

verses.verseString: نَذِيرًا لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.verseStringB: A warning to humans.

verses.verseString: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.verseStringB: To those among you who wish to advance, or lag behind.

verses.verseString: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Every soul is hostage to what it has done.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Except for those on the Right.

verses.verseString: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: In Gardens, asking one another.

verses.verseString: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: About the guilty.

verses.verseString: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.verseStringB: “What led you into Saqar?”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: They will say, “We were not of those who prayed.

verses.verseString: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Nor did we feed the poor.

verses.verseString: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And we used to indulge with those who indulge.

verses.verseString: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: And we used to deny Judgement Day.

verses.verseString: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.verseStringB: Until certainty came upon us.”

verses.verseString: فَمَا تَنْفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But the intercession of intercessors will not benefit them.

verses.verseString: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.verseStringB: So what is the matter with them, turning away from the Reminder?

verses.verseString: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُسْتَنْفِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: As if they were panicked donkeys.

verses.verseString: فَرَّتْ مِنْ قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Fleeing from a lion.

verses.verseString: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ أَنْ يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُنَشَّرَةً
verses.verseStringB: Yet every one of them wants to be given scrolls unrolled.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ لَا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Nevertheless, it is a reminder.

verses.verseString: فَمَنْ شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: So whoever wills, shall remember it.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.verseStringB: But they will not remember—unless Allah wills. He is the Source of Righteousness and the Source of Forgiveness.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.verseStringB: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

verses.verseString: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.verseStringB: And I swear by the blaming soul.

verses.verseString: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَلَّنْ نَجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Does the human being think that We will not gather his bones?

verses.verseString: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَنْ نُسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Yes indeed! We are able to reconstruct his fingertips.

verses.verseString: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنْسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.verseStringB: But the human being wants to deny what lies ahead of him.

verses.verseString: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.verseStringB: He asks, “When is the Day of Resurrection?”

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.verseStringB: When vision is dazzled.

verses.verseString: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.verseStringB: And the moon is eclipsed.

verses.verseString: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.verseStringB: And the sun and the moon are joined together.

verses.verseString: يَقُولُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, man will say, “Where is the escape?”

verses.verseString: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed! There is no refuge.

verses.verseString: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.verseStringB: To your Lord on that Day is the settlement.

verses.verseString: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, man will be informed of what he put forward, and what he left behind.

verses.verseString: بَلِ الْإِنْسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And man will be evidence against himself.

verses.verseString: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Even as he presents his excuses.

verses.verseString: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.verseStringB: Do not move your tongue with it, to hurry on with it.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Upon Us are its collection and its recitation.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then, when We have recited it, follow its recitation.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then upon Us is its explanation.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.verseStringB: Alas! But you love the Fleeting.

verses.verseString: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.verseStringB: And you disregard the Hereafter.

verses.verseString: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاضِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Faces on that Day will be radiant.

verses.verseString: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Looking towards their Lord.

verses.verseString: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And faces on that Day will be gloomy.

verses.verseString: تَظُنُّ أَنْ يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Realizing that a back-breaker has befallen them.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.verseStringB: Indeed, when it has reached the collarbones.

verses.verseString: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.verseStringB: And it is said, “Who is the healer?”

verses.verseString: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.verseStringB: And he realizes that it is the parting.

verses.verseString: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.verseStringB: And the leg is entwined with the leg.

verses.verseString: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.verseStringB: To your Lord on that Day is the drive.

verses.verseString: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He neither believed nor prayed.

verses.verseString: وَلَٰكِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But he denied and turned away.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then he went to his family, walking proudly.

verses.verseString: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: So nearer to you! And nearer!

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then again: Nearer to you! And nearer!

verses.verseString: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنْ يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.verseStringB: Does the human being think that he will be left without purpose?

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِنْ مَنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Was he not a fertilized egg from ejaculated semen?

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then he became a clot. And He created and proportioned?

verses.verseString: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And He made of him the two sexes: the male, and the female?

verses.verseString: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَنْ يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Is not such able to give life to the dead?

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنْسَانِ حِينٌ مِنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُنْ شَيْئًا مَذْكُورًا
verses.verseStringB: Has there come upon the human being a span of time when he was nothing to be mentioned?

verses.verseString: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: We created the human being from a drop of mixed fluid, to test him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.verseStringB: We guided him to the way, be he appreciative or unappreciative.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, and yokes, and a Searing Fire.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِنْ كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.verseStringB: But the righteous will drink from a cup mixed with aroma.

verses.verseString: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: A spring from which Allah’s servants will drink, making it gush abundantly.

verses.verseString: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: They fulfill their vows, and they dread a Day whose ill is widespread.

verses.verseString: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: And they feed, for the love of Him, the poor, the orphan, and the prisoner.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنْكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.verseStringB: “We feed you only for Allah’s sake. We desire from you neither compensation nor gratitude.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِنْ رَبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: We dread from our Lord a frowning, grim Day.”

verses.verseString: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.verseStringB: So Allah will shield them from the horror of that Day, and He will grant them radiance and joy.

verses.verseString: وَجَزَاهُمْ بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: And He will reward them, for having been patient, with a Garden and silk.

verses.verseString: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: Reclining in it on the couches; experiencing in it neither sun nor bitter cold.

verses.verseString: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: Its shade hovering over them, and its fruit brought low within reach.

verses.verseString: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِآنِيَةٍ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.verseStringB: Circulating among them are vessels of silver, and cups of crystal.

verses.verseString: قَوَارِيرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: Crystalline silver—they measured them precisely.

verses.verseString: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنْجَبِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: And they will be given a drink flavored with ginger.

verses.verseString: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: From a spring there, named Salsabeel.

verses.verseString: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَنْثُورًا
verses.verseStringB: Passing among them are eternalized youths. If you saw them, you would think them sprinkled pearls.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: If you look, and look, you will see bliss and a vast kingdom.

verses.verseString: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُنْدُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.verseStringB: Upon them are garments of green silk and satin. And they will be decorated with silver bracelets. And their Lord will offer them a pure drink.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُمْ مَشْكُورًا
verses.verseStringB: “This is a reward for you. Your efforts are well appreciated.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنْزِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: It is We who sent down the Quran upon you—a gradual revelation.

verses.verseString: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.verseStringB: So be patient with your Lord’s judgment. And obey among them neither sinner nor disbeliever.

verses.verseString: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: And mention the Name of your Lord, morning and evening.

verses.verseString: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: And during the night, prostrate to Him, and glorify Him long into the night.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: As for these: they love the transient, and they leave behind a Heavy Day.

verses.verseString: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: We created them, and We strengthened their frames. And whenever We will, We will replace them with others like them.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.verseStringB: This is a reminder; so whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.

verses.verseString: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: Yet you cannot will—unless Allah wills. Allah is Knowing and Wise.

verses.verseString: يُدْخِلُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.verseStringB: He admits into His mercy whomever He wills. But as for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.verseStringB: By those sent in succession.

verses.verseString: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.verseStringB: And those storming turbulently.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And the spreaders spreading.

verses.verseString: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.verseStringB: And the separators separating.

verses.verseString: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And those delivering a reminder.

verses.verseString: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.verseStringB: Excusing or warning.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.verseStringB: What you are promised will surely happen.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the stars are blotted out.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the sky is fractured.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains are powdered.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the messengers’ time is appointed.

verses.verseString: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.verseStringB: Until which Day was it postponed?

verses.verseString: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.verseStringB: Until the Day of Separation.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what the Day of Separation is?

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the liars.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Did We not destroy the ancients?

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then succeeded them with the others?

verses.verseString: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We deal with the guilty.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقْكُمْ مِنْ مَاءٍ مَهِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Did We not create you from a base fluid?

verses.verseString: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَكِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Then lodged it in a secure place?

verses.verseString: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَعْلُومٍ
verses.verseStringB: For a known period?

verses.verseString: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And We measured. How excellently We measure.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: Did We not make the earth a homestead?

verses.verseString: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: For the living and the dead?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُمْ مَاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: And We placed on it lofty mountains, and We gave you fresh water to drink?

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.

verses.verseString: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Proceed to what you used to deny.”

verses.verseString: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.verseStringB: “Proceed to a three-pronged shadow.”

verses.verseString: لَا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.verseStringB: That provides no shade, nor avails against the flames.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.verseStringB: It shoots up sparks like towers.

verses.verseString: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.verseStringB: As if they are yellow camels.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the liars.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنْطِقُونَ
verses.verseStringB: This is a Day when they will not speak.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And they will not be permitted to offer excuses.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: This is the Day of Separation. We have gathered you, together with the ancients.

verses.verseString: فَإِنْ كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.verseStringB: So if you have a scheme, then scheme against Me!

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: The reverent will be amidst shades and springs.

verses.verseString: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And fruits of whatever they desire.

verses.verseString: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Eat and drink pleasantly, for what you used to do.”

verses.verseString: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Thus We reward the virtuous.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.verseString: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُمْ مُجْرِمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: “Eat and enjoy a little; you are guilty.”

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the liars.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And when it is said to them, “Bow down,” they do not bow down.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.verseString: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So in what saying, beyond this, will they believe?

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: What are they asking one another about?

verses.verseString: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: About the Momentous News.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: About which they disagree.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Surely, they will know.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Most certainly, they will know.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.verseStringB: Did We not make the earth a cradle?

verses.verseString: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains pegs?

verses.verseString: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: And created you in pairs?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: And made your sleep for rest?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.verseStringB: And made the night a cover?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.verseStringB: And made the day for livelihood?

verses.verseString: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.verseStringB: And constructed above you seven firmaments?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.verseStringB: And placed a blazing lamp?

verses.verseString: وَأَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.verseStringB: And sent down from the clouds pouring water?

verses.verseString: لِنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: To produce with it grains and vegetation?

verses.verseString: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.verseStringB: And lush gardens?

verses.verseString: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: The Day of Sorting has been appointed.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يُنْفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: The Day when the Trumpet is blown, and you will come in crowds.

verses.verseString: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.verseStringB: And the sky is opened up, and it becomes gateways.

verses.verseString: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains are set in motion, and they become a mirage.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.verseStringB: Hell is lying in ambush.

verses.verseString: لِلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.verseStringB: For the oppressors, a destination.

verses.verseString: لَابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.verseStringB: Where they will remain for eons.

verses.verseString: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: They will taste in it neither coolness nor drink.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.verseStringB: Except boiling water and freezing hail.

verses.verseString: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.verseStringB: An appropriate punishment.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.verseStringB: They were not anticipating any reckoning.

verses.verseString: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.verseStringB: And they denied Our signs with utter denial.

verses.verseString: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.verseStringB: And We have recorded everything in a book.

verses.verseString: فَذُوقُوا فَلَنْ نَزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.verseStringB: So taste! We will increase you in nothing but suffering.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.verseStringB: But for the righteous, there is triumph.

verses.verseString: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.verseStringB: Gardens and vineyards.

verses.verseString: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: And splendid spouses, well-matched.

verses.verseString: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.verseStringB: And overflowing cups.

verses.verseString: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.verseStringB: They will hear in it neither gossip nor lies.

verses.verseString: جَزَاءً مِنْ رَبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.verseStringB: A reward from your Lord, a calculated reward.

verses.verseString: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.verseStringB: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and whatever is between them—The Most Merciful—they will have no authorization from Him to speak.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels stand in a row. They will not speak, except those granted permission by the Compassionate and whose words are true.

verses.verseString: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.verseStringB: This is the Day of Reality. So whoever wills, let him take a path back to his Lord.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَنْذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنْظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنْتُ تُرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day when a person will observe what his hands have produced, and the unbeliever will say, “I wish I were dust.”

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.verseStringB: By those snatching violently.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.verseStringB: And those removing gently.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.verseStringB: And those gliding smoothly.

verses.verseString: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.verseStringB: And those racing swiftly.

verses.verseString: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And those regulating events.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the Quake quakes.

verses.verseString: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.verseStringB: And is followed by the Successor.

verses.verseString: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Hearts on that Day will be pounding.

verses.verseString: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Their sights downcast.

verses.verseString: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.verseStringB: They say, “Are we to be restored to the original condition?

verses.verseString: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَخِرَةً
verses.verseStringB: When we have become hollow bones?”

verses.verseString: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: They say, “This is a losing proposition.”

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: But it will be only a single nudge.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا هُمْ بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.verseStringB: And they will be awake.

verses.verseString: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Has the story of Moses reached you?

verses.verseString: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.verseStringB: When His Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa.

verses.verseString: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: “Go to Pharaoh—he has transgressed.”

verses.verseString: فَقُلْ هَلْ لَكَ إِلَىٰ أَنْ تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And say, “Do you care to be purified?

verses.verseString: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And I will guide you to your Lord, and you will turn reverent.”

verses.verseString: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then he showed him the Great Miracle.

verses.verseString: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But he denied and disobeyed.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then he turned his back, and tried.

verses.verseString: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And gathered and proclaimed.

verses.verseString: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “I am your Lord, the most high.”

verses.verseString: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: So Allah seized him with exemplary punishment, in the last and in the first.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِمَنْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: In this is a lesson for whoever fears.

verses.verseString: أَأَنْتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: Are you more difficult to create, or the sky? He constructed it.

verses.verseString: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.verseStringB: He raised its masses, and He proportioned it.

verses.verseString: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And He dimmed its night, and He brought out its daylight.

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And after that, He spread out the earth.

verses.verseString: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And from it, He brought out its water and its pasture.

verses.verseString: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains, He anchored.

verses.verseString: مَتَاعًا لَكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.verseStringB: A source of enjoyment for you and your livestock.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But when the Great Cataclysm befalls.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: A Day when the human being will remember what he has endeavored.

verses.verseString: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَنْ يَرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And the Furnace will be displayed for whoever sees.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا مَنْ طَغَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: As for him who has transgressed.

verses.verseString: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.verseStringB: And preferred the life of this world.

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then the Furnace is the shelter.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But as for him who feared the Standing of his Lord, and restrained the self from desires.

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then Paradise is the shelter.

verses.verseString: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: They ask you about the Hour, “When will it take place?”

verses.verseString: فِيمَ أَنْتَ مِنْ ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: You have no knowledge of it.

verses.verseString: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنْتَهَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: To your Lord is its finality.

verses.verseString: إِنَّمَا أَنْتَ مُنْذِرُ مَنْ يَخْشَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: You are only to warn whoever dreads it.

verses.verseString: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when they see it—it will be as if they had stayed only an evening or its morning.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He frowned and turned away.

verses.verseString: أَنْ جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Because the blind man came to him.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But how do you know? Perhaps he was seeking to purify himself.

verses.verseString: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنْفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Or be reminded, and the message would benefit him.

verses.verseString: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But as for him who was indifferent.

verses.verseString: فَأَنْتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: You gave him your attention.

verses.verseString: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا مَنْ جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But as for him who came to you seeking.

verses.verseString: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: In awe.

verses.verseString: فَأَنْتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: To him you were inattentive.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Do not. This is a Lesson.

verses.verseString: فَمَنْ شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: So whoever wills, shall take notice from it.

verses.verseString: فِي صُحُفٍ مُكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: In honorable pages.

verses.verseString: مَرْفُوعَةٍ مُطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Elevated and purified.

verses.verseString: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: By the hands of scribes.

verses.verseString: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Noble and virtuous.

verses.verseString: قُتِلَ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Perish the human being! How ungrateful he is!

verses.verseString: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.verseStringB: From what thing did He create him?

verses.verseString: مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: From a drop He created him. Then He proportioned him.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then He eased the way for him.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then He puts him to death, and He buries him.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنْشَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Then, whenever He wills, He will resurrect him.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: But no, he did not fulfill what He commanded him.

verses.verseString: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْإِنْسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.verseStringB: Let the human being look at his food.

verses.verseString: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.verseStringB: How We pour down water in abundance.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.verseStringB: Then crack the soil open.

verses.verseString: فَأَنْبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.verseStringB: And grow in it grains.

verses.verseString: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.verseStringB: And grapes and herbs.

verses.verseString: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.verseStringB: And olives and dates.

verses.verseString: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.verseStringB: And luscious gardens.

verses.verseString: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.verseStringB: And fruits and vegetables.

verses.verseString: مَتَاعًا لَكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.verseStringB: As sustenance for you and for your livestock.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.verseStringB: But when the Deafening Blast comes to pass.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when a person will flee from his brother.

verses.verseString: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: And his mother and his father.

verses.verseString: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: And his spouse and his children.

verses.verseString: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: Every one of them, on that Day, will have enough to preoccupy him.

verses.verseString: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُسْفِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Faces on that Day will be radiant.

verses.verseString: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Laughing and rejoicing.

verses.verseString: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And faces on that Day will be covered with dust.

verses.verseString: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Covered by darkness.

verses.verseString: أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.verseStringB: These are the faithless, the vicious.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the sun is rolled.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انْكَدَرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the stars are dimmed.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains are set in motion.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the relationships are suspended.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the beasts are gathered.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the oceans are set aflame.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the souls are paired.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the girl, buried alive, is asked:

verses.verseString: بِأَيِّ ذَنْبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.verseStringB: For what crime was she killed?

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And when the pages are made public.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the sky is peeled away.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And the Fire is set ablaze.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And Paradise is brought near.

verses.verseString: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: Each soul will know what it has readied.

verses.verseString: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.verseStringB: I swear by the galaxies.

verses.verseString: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.verseStringB: Precisely running their courses.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.verseStringB: And by the night, as it dissipates.

verses.verseString: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.verseStringB: And by the morning, as it breathes.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: This is the speech of a noble messenger.

verses.verseString: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِنْدَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Endowed with strength, secure with the Lord of the Throne.

verses.verseString: مُطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Obeyed and trustworthy.

verses.verseString: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُمْ بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: Your friend is not possessed.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.verseStringB: He saw him on the clear horizon.

verses.verseString: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.verseStringB: And He does not withhold knowledge of the Unseen.

verses.verseString: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَجِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: And it is not the word of an outcast devil.

verses.verseString: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So where are you heading?

verses.verseString: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: It is nothing but a reminder for humankind.

verses.verseString: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: To whoever among you wills to go straight.

verses.verseString: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: But you cannot will, unless Allah wills, Lord of the Worlds.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انْفَطَرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the sky breaks apart.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انْتَثَرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the planets are scattered.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the oceans are exploded.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the graves are tossed around.

verses.verseString: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.verseStringB: Every soul will know what it has advanced, and what it has deferred.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنْسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: O, man! What deluded you concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?

verses.verseString: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.verseStringB: He Who created you, and formed you, and proportioned you.

verses.verseString: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
