verses.verseStringB: In whatever form He willed, He assembled you.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: But you reject the religion.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Although there are guardians over you.

verses.verseString: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Honest recorders.

verses.verseString: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: They know everything you do.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: The righteous will be in bliss.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: And the wicked will be in Hell.

verses.verseString: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: They will enter it on Judgment Day.

verses.verseString: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And they will not be absent from it.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: Then again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلَّهِ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when no soul will avail another soul whatsoever—and all authority on that Day is Allah’s.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ لِلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe to the defrauders.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who, when they take a measure from people, demand in full.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَوْ وَزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But when they measure or weigh to others, they cheat.

verses.verseString: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَٰئِكَ أَنَّهُمْ مَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Do these not know that they will be resurrected?

verses.verseString: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: For a Tremendous Day?

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when Humankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.verseStringB: Not at all. The record of the wicked is in Sijjeen.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what Sijjeen is?

verses.verseString: كِتَابٌ مَرْقُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: A numerical book.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Woe on that Day to the deniers.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: Those who deny the Day of Reckoning.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: But none denies it except the sinful aggressor.

verses.verseString: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: When Our Verses are read to him, he says, “Legends of the ancients.”

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ مَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But no! Their hearts have become corroded by what they used to commit.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَنْ رَبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Undoubtedly, on that Day, they will be screened from their Lord.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Then they will roast in the Blaze.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Then it will be said, “This is what you used to deny.”

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed. The record of the righteous is in Elliyyeen.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what Elliyyoon is?

verses.verseString: كِتَابٌ مَرْقُومٌ
verses.verseStringB: A numerical book.

verses.verseString: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Witnessed by those brought near.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: Surely, the virtuous will be in bliss.

verses.verseString: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنْظُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On luxurious furnishings, gazing around.

verses.verseString: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: You will recognize on their faces the radiance of bliss.

verses.verseString: يُسْقَوْنَ مِنْ رَحِيقٍ مَخْتُومٍ
verses.verseStringB: They will be given to drink of pure sealed wine.

verses.verseString: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Its seal is musk—this is what competitors should compete for.

verses.verseString: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِنْ تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: And its mixture is of Tasneem.

verses.verseString: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: A spring from which those brought near drink.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And when they passed by them, they would wink at one another.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا انْقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انْقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And when they returned to their families, they would return joyfully.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.verseStringB: And when they saw them, they would say, “These people are lost.”

verses.verseString: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Although they were not sent as guardians over them.

verses.verseString: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But on that Day, those who believed will laugh at the unbelievers.

verses.verseString: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنْظُرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: On luxurious furnishings, looking on.

verses.verseString: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Have the unbelievers been repaid for what they used to do?

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انْشَقَّتْ
verses.verseStringB: When the sky is ruptured.

verses.verseString: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.verseStringB: And obeys its Lord, as it must.

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.verseStringB: And when the earth is stretched.

verses.verseString: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.verseStringB: And ejects its contents and becomes empty.

verses.verseString: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.verseStringB: And obeys its Lord, as it must.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنْسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.verseStringB: O, man! You are laboring towards your Lord, and you will meet Him.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.verseStringB: As for him who is given his book in his right hand.

verses.verseString: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: He will be reckoned with an easy reckoning.

verses.verseString: وَيَنْقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.verseStringB: And will return to his family delighted.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.verseStringB: But as for him who is given his book behind his back.

verses.verseString: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.verseStringB: He will call for destruction.

verses.verseString: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: And will enter a Blaze.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.verseStringB: He used to be happy among his family.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَنْ لَنْ يَحُورَ
verses.verseStringB: He thought he would not return.

verses.verseString: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.verseStringB: In fact, His Lord was watching him.

verses.verseString: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.verseStringB: I swear by the twilight.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.verseStringB: And by the night, and what it enshrouds.

verses.verseString: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.verseStringB: And by the moon, when it is full.

verses.verseString: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَنْ طَبَقٍ
verses.verseStringB: You will mount stage by stage.

verses.verseString: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.verseStringB: So what is the matter with them, that they do not believe?

verses.verseString: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.verseStringB: And when the Quran is read to them, they do not bow down?

verses.verseString: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: But Allah knows what they hide inside.

verses.verseString: فَبَشِّرْهُمْ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: So inform them of a painful punishment.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: Except for those who believe and do good deeds—they will have a never-ending reward.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.verseStringB: By the sky full of constellations.

verses.verseString: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.verseStringB: And by the Promised Day.

verses.verseString: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.verseStringB: And by the witness and the witnessed.

verses.verseString: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.verseStringB: Destroyed were the People of the Trench.

verses.verseString: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.verseStringB: The fire supplied with fuel.

verses.verseString: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.verseStringB: While they sat around it.

verses.verseString: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.verseStringB: And were witnessing what they were doing to the believers.

verses.verseString: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَنْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: They took vengeance on them only because they believed in Allah the Almighty, the Praised.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: He to Whom belongs sovereignty over the heavens and the earth. And Allah is witness over everything.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.verseStringB: Those who persecute believing men and believing women, then do not repent: for them is the punishment of Hell, and for them is the punishment of Burning.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: Those who believe and do righteous deeds will have Gardens beneath which rivers flow: that is the supreme triumph.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: The onslaught of your Lord is severe.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: It is He who begins and repeats.

verses.verseString: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.verseStringB: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving.

verses.verseString: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: Owner of the Glorious Throne.

verses.verseString: فَعَّالٌ لِمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: Doer of whatever He wills.

verses.verseString: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.verseStringB: Has the story of the legions reached you?

verses.verseString: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.verseStringB: Of Pharaoh and Thamood?

verses.verseString: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ مِنْ وَرَائِهِمْ مُحِيطٌ
verses.verseStringB: But Allah encloses them from beyond.

verses.verseString: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَجِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, it is a Glorious Quran.

verses.verseString: فِي لَوْحٍ مَحْفُوظٍ
verses.verseStringB: In a Preserved Tablet.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.verseStringB: By the sky and the Pulsar.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what the Pulsar is?

verses.verseString: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.verseStringB: The Piercing Star.

verses.verseString: إِنْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.verseStringB: There is no soul without a guardian over it.

verses.verseString: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْإِنْسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.verseStringB: So let the human being consider what he was created from.

verses.verseString: خُلِقَ مِنْ مَاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.verseStringB: He was created from gushing fluid.

verses.verseString: يَخْرُجُ مِنْ بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.verseStringB: Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.verseStringB: He is certainly able to return him.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when secrets are disclosed.

verses.verseString: فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: He will have neither strength nor helper.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.verseStringB: By the sky that returns.

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.verseStringB: And the earth that cracks open.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.verseStringB: It is a Decisive Word.

verses.verseString: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.verseStringB: And it is no joke.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.verseStringB: They plot and scheme.

verses.verseString: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.verseStringB: But I plan and plan.

verses.verseString: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.verseStringB: Therefore, give the unbelievers some time; leave them for a while.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.verseStringB: Praise the Name of your Lord, the Most High.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who creates and regulates.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who measures and guides.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who produces the pasture.

verses.verseString: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Then reduces it to light debris.

verses.verseString: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنْسَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: We will make you read, so do not forget.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Except what Allah wills. He knows what is declared, and what is hidden.

verses.verseString: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.

verses.verseString: فَذَكِّرْ إِنْ نَفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: So remind, if the reminder is beneficial.

verses.verseString: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَنْ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who fears will take notice.

verses.verseString: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.verseStringB: But the most wretched will avoid it.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who will enter the Gigantic Fire.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Where he will neither die, nor live.

verses.verseString: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَنْ تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Successful is he who purifies himself.

verses.verseString: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And remembers the Name of his Lord, and prays.

verses.verseString: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.verseStringB: But you prefer the present life.

verses.verseString: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Even though the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: This is in the earlier scriptures.

verses.verseString: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: The Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.verseStringB: Has the news of the Overwhelming reached you?

verses.verseString: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Faces on that Day will be downcast.

verses.verseString: عَامِلَةٌ نَاصِبَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Laboring and exhausted.

verses.verseString: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.verseStringB: Entering a scorching Fire.

verses.verseString: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Given to drink from a flaming spring.

verses.verseString: لَيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ ضَرِيعٍ
verses.verseStringB: They will have no food except thorns.

verses.verseString: لَا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنْ جُوعٍ
verses.verseStringB: Neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.

verses.verseString: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاعِمَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Faces on that Day will be radiant.

verses.verseString: لِسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Satisfied with their endeavor.

verses.verseString: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: In a lofty Garden.

verses.verseString: لَا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.verseStringB: In it, you will hear no nonsense.

verses.verseString: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: In it, is a flowing spring.

verses.verseString: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: In it, are raised beds.

verses.verseString: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And cups set in place.

verses.verseString: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And cushions lined up.

verses.verseString: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: And carpets spread around.

verses.verseString: أَفَلَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.verseStringB: Do they not look at the camels—how they are created?

verses.verseString: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And at the sky—how it is raised?

verses.verseString: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And at the mountains—how they are installed?

verses.verseString: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.verseStringB: And at the earth—how it is spread out?

verses.verseString: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنْتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.verseStringB: So remind. You are only a reminder.

verses.verseString: لَسْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.verseStringB: You have no control over them.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَنْ تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.verseStringB: But whoever turns away and disbelieves.

verses.verseString: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.verseStringB: Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.verseStringB: To Us is their return.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُمْ
verses.verseStringB: Then upon Us rests their reckoning.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.verseStringB: By the dawn.

verses.verseString: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.verseStringB: And ten nights.

verses.verseString: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.verseStringB: And the even and the odd.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.verseStringB: And the night as it recedes.

verses.verseString: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.verseStringB: Is there an oath in that for a rational person?

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.verseStringB: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad?

verses.verseString: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.verseStringB: Erum of the pillars.

verses.verseString: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.verseStringB: The like of which was never created in the land.

verses.verseString: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.verseStringB: And Thamood—those who carved out the rocks in the Valley.

verses.verseString: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.verseStringB: And Pharaoh of the Stakes.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.verseStringB: Those who committed excesses in the lands.

verses.verseString: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.verseStringB: And spread much corruption in it.

verses.verseString: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.verseStringB: So your Lord poured down on them a scourge of punishment.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.verseStringB: Your Lord is on the lookout.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا الْإِنْسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.verseStringB: As for the human being, whenever his Lord tests him, and honors him, and prospers him, he says, “My Lord has honored me.”

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.verseStringB: But whenever He tests him, and He restricts his livelihood for him, he says, “My Lord has disgraced me.”

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ لَا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: Not at all. But you are not generous towards the orphan.

verses.verseString: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And you do not urge the feeding of the poor.

verses.verseString: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَمًّا
verses.verseStringB: And you devour inheritance with all greed.

verses.verseString: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.verseStringB: And you love wealth with immense love.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.verseStringB: No—when the earth is pounded, crushed, and leveled.

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.verseStringB: And your Lord comes, with the angels, row after row.

verses.verseString: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنْسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And on that Day, Hell will be brought. On that Day, the human being will remember, but how will remembrance avail him?

verses.verseString: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.verseStringB: He will say, “If only I had forwarded for my life.”

verses.verseString: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, none will punish as He punishes.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And none will shackle as He shackles.

verses.verseString: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.verseStringB: But as for you, O tranquil soul.

verses.verseString: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَرْضِيَّةً
verses.verseStringB: Return to your Lord, pleased and accepted.

verses.verseString: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.verseStringB: Enter among My worshipers.

verses.verseString: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.verseStringB: Enter My Garden.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.verseStringB: I swear by this land.

verses.verseString: وَأَنْتَ حِلٌّ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.verseStringB: And you are free in this land.

verses.verseString: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.verseStringB: And by a father and what he fathered.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.verseStringB: We created the human being in distress.

verses.verseString: أَيَحْسَبُ أَنْ لَنْ يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Does he think that none will ever have power over him?

verses.verseString: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُبَدًا
verses.verseStringB: He says, “I have squandered vast wealth.”

verses.verseString: أَيَحْسَبُ أَنْ لَمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Does he think that no one sees him?

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلْ لَهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.verseStringB: Did We not make for him two eyes?

verses.verseString: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.verseStringB: And a tongue, and two lips?

verses.verseString: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.verseStringB: And We guided him to the two ways?

verses.verseString: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.verseStringB: But he did not brave the ascent.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.verseStringB: And how would you know what the ascent is?

verses.verseString: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: The freeing of a slave.

verses.verseString: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.

verses.verseString: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Of an orphaned relative.

verses.verseString: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Or a destitute in the dust.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.verseStringB: Then he becomes of those who believe, and advise one another to patience, and advise one another to kindness.

verses.verseString: أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.verseStringB: These are the people of happiness.

verses.verseString: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.verseStringB: But as for those who defy Our revelations—these are the people of misery.

verses.verseString: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Upon them is a padlocked Fire.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: By the sun and its brightness.

verses.verseString: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the moon as it follows it.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the day as it reveals it.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the night as it conceals it.

verses.verseString: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the sky, and He who built it.

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the earth, and He who spread it.

verses.verseString: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the soul, and He who formed it.

verses.verseString: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And inspired it to its immoralities and its righteousness.

verses.verseString: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَنْ زَكَّاهَا
verses.verseStringB: Successful is he who purifies it.

verses.verseString: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ دَسَّاهَا
verses.verseStringB: And failing is he who corrupts it.

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: Thamood denied in its rebelliousness.

verses.verseString: إِذِ انْبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: When it followed its most wretched.

verses.verseString: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: The messenger of Allah said to them, “Allah's female camel, so let her drink.”

verses.verseString: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِذَنْبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.verseStringB: But they denied him, then hamstrung her. So their Lord crushed them for their sin, and He leveled it.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.verseStringB: He does not fear its consequences.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: By the night as it conceals.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And the day as it reveals.

verses.verseString: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And He who created the male and the female.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Your endeavors are diverse.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: As for him who is charitable and righteous.

verses.verseString: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And confirms goodness.

verses.verseString: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: We will facilitate for him the path of ease.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا مَنْ بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But as for him who is stingy and indifferent.

verses.verseString: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And denies goodness.

verses.verseString: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: We will facilitate for him the path of difficulty.

verses.verseString: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And his money will not avail him when he plummets.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: It is upon Us to guide.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And to Us belong the Last and the First.

verses.verseString: فَأَنْذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: I have warned you of a Raging Fire.

verses.verseString: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.verseStringB: Which none will enter except the most wretched.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who denies and turns away.

verses.verseString: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.verseStringB: But the devout will avoid it.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: He who gives his wealth to be purified.

verses.verseString: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِنْدَهُ مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Seeking no favors in return.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Only seeking the attention of his Lord, the Most High.

verses.verseString: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And he will be pleased.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: By the morning brightness.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And the night as it settles.

verses.verseString: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Your Lord did not abandon you, nor is He displeased.

verses.verseString: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: The Hereafter is better for you than the First.

verses.verseString: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Did He not find you orphaned, and He sheltered you?

verses.verseString: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And found you wandering, and He guided you?

verses.verseString: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: And found you in need, and He enriched you?

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.verseStringB: Therefore, do not mistreat the orphan.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.verseStringB: Nor snub the seeker.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.verseStringB: But proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.verseStringB: Did We not soothe your heart for you?

verses.verseString: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنْكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.verseStringB: And lift your burden from you.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي أَنْقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.verseStringB: Which weighed down your back?

verses.verseString: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.verseStringB: And We raised your reputation for you?

verses.verseString: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.verseStringB: With difficulty, there is ease.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.verseStringB: With difficulty, there is ease.

verses.verseString: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانْصَبْ
verses.verseStringB: When your work is done, turn to devotion.

verses.verseString: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَبْ
verses.verseStringB: And be eager for your Lord.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.verseStringB: By the fig and the olive.

verses.verseString: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.verseStringB: And Mount Sinai.

verses.verseString: وَهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And this secure land.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: We created the human being in the best design.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Then We reduced him to the lowest of the low.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: Except those who believe and do good deeds—they will have an unending reward.

verses.verseString: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: So what makes you deny the religion?

verses.verseString: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.verseStringB: Is Allah not the Wisest of Judges?

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.verseStringB: Read: In the Name of your Lord, who created.

verses.verseString: خَلَقَ الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.verseStringB: Created man from a clinging clot.

verses.verseString: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.verseStringB: Read: And your Lord is the Most Generous.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.verseStringB: He Who taught by the pen.

verses.verseString: عَلَّمَ الْإِنْسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.verseStringB: Taught man what he never knew.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: In fact, the human being oversteps all bounds.

verses.verseString: أَنْ رَآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: When he considers himself exempt.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: But to your Lord is the return.

verses.verseString: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Have you seen him who prevents?

verses.verseString: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: A servant when he prays?

verses.verseString: أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Do you think he is upon guidance?

verses.verseString: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Or advocates righteousness?

verses.verseString: أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Did you see how he denied and turned away?

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمْ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.verseStringB: Does he not know that Allah sees?

verses.verseString: كَلَّا لَئِنْ لَمْ يَنْتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.verseStringB: No. If he does not desist, We will drag him by the forelock.

verses.verseString: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: A lying, sinful forelock.

verses.verseString: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.verseStringB: So let him call his gang.

verses.verseString: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.verseStringB: We will call the Wardens.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِبْ ۩
verses.verseStringB: No, do not obey him, but bow down, and come near.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.verseStringB: We sent it down on the Night of Destiny.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.verseStringB: But how would you know what the Night of Destiny is?

verses.verseString: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.verseStringB: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months.

verses.verseString: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ مِنْ كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.verseStringB: In it descend the angels and the Spirit, by their Lord's permission, with every command.

verses.verseString: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.verseStringB: Peace it is—until the break of dawn.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنْفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.verseStringB: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture and the Polytheists were not apart until the Clear Evidence came to them.

verses.verseString: رَسُولٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُطَهَّرَةً
verses.verseStringB: A messenger from Allah reciting purified scriptures.

verses.verseString: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: Containing valuable writings.

verses.verseString: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.verseStringB: Those who were given the Scripture did not splinter, until after the Clear Evidence came to them.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.verseStringB: They were only commanded to worship Allah, devoting their faith to Him alone, and to practice regular prayer, and to give the purifying charity—that is the upright religion.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.verseStringB: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture and the Polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, remaining in it forever. These are the worst of creatures.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.verseStringB: As for those who believe and do good works—these are the best of creatures.

verses.verseString: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.verseStringB: Their reward is with their Lord: Gardens of Eden beneath which rivers flow, remaining in them forever. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. That is for whoever fears His Lord.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.verseStringB: When the earth is shaken with its quake.

verses.verseString: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the earth brings out its loads.

verses.verseString: وَقَالَ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.verseStringB: And the human being says, “What is the matter with it?”

verses.verseString: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, it will convey its chronicles.

verses.verseString: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.verseStringB: Because your Lord will have inspired it.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, the people will emerge in droves, to be shown their works.

verses.verseString: فَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.

verses.verseString: وَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.verseStringB: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.verseStringB: By the panting chargers.

verses.verseString: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.verseStringB: By the igniters of sparks.

verses.verseString: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.verseStringB: By the raiders at dawn.

verses.verseString: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.verseStringB: Raising clouds of dust.

verses.verseString: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.verseStringB: Storming into the midst.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.verseStringB: The human being is ungrateful to his Lord.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And he bears witness to that.

verses.verseString: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And he is fierce in his love of good things.

verses.verseString: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.verseStringB: Does he not know? When the graves’ contents are scattered around.

verses.verseString: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.verseStringB: And the hearts’ contents are retrieved.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ رَبَّهُمْ بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَخَبِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: On that Day, their Lord is fully informed of them.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.verseStringB: The Shocker.

verses.verseString: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.verseStringB: What is the Shocker?

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.verseStringB: And how would you know what the Shocker is?

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when people will be like scattered moths.

verses.verseString: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنْفُوشِ
verses.verseStringB: And the mountains will be like fluffed up wool.

verses.verseString: فَأَمَّا مَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.verseStringB: As for he whose scales are heavy.

verses.verseString: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَاضِيَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: He will be in a pleasant life.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.verseStringB: But as for he whose scales are light.

verses.verseString: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: His home is the Abyss.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what it is?

verses.verseString: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: A Raging Fire.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.verseStringB: Vying for increase distracts you.

verses.verseString: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.verseStringB: Until you visit the graveyards.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed, you will know.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Again: No indeed, you will know.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.verseStringB: No indeed, If you knew with the knowledge of certainty.

verses.verseString: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: You would see the Inferno.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.verseStringB: Then you will see it with the eye of certainty.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: Then, on that Day, you will be questioned about the pleasures.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.verseStringB: By Time.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.verseStringB: The human being is in loss.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.verseStringB: Except those who believe, and do good works, and recommend truth, and recommend patience.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: وَيْلٌ لِكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُمَزَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: Woe to every slandering backbiter.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Who amasses wealth and counts it over.

verses.verseString: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.verseStringB: Thinking that his wealth has eternalized him.

verses.verseString: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنْبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.verseStringB: By no means. He will be thrown into the Crusher.

verses.verseString: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.verseStringB: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?

verses.verseString: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.verseStringB: Allah's kindled Fire.

verses.verseString: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.verseStringB: That laps to the hearts.

verses.verseString: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِمْ مُؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.verseStringB: It closes in on them.

verses.verseString: فِي عَمَدٍ مُمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.verseStringB: In extended columns.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.verseStringB: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the masters of the elephant?

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.verseStringB: Did He not make their plan go wrong?

verses.verseString: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.verseStringB: And sent against them flocks of birds.

verses.verseString: تَرْمِيهِمْ بِحِجَارَةٍ مِنْ سِجِّيلٍ
verses.verseStringB: Striking them with stones of baked clay.

verses.verseString: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَأْكُولٍ
verses.verseStringB: Leaving them like chewed-up leaves.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.verseStringB: For the security of Quraish.

verses.verseString: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.verseStringB: Their security during winter and summer journeys.

verses.verseString: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.verseStringB: Let them worship the Lord of this House.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُمْ مِنْ جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُمْ مِنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.verseStringB: Who has fed them against hunger, and secured them against fear.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.verseStringB: Have you considered him who denies the religion?

verses.verseString: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.verseStringB: It is he who pushes the orphan away.

verses.verseString: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.verseStringB: And does not urge the feeding of the poor.

verses.verseString: فَوَيْلٌ لِلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.verseStringB: So woe to those who pray.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنْ صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who are heedless of their prayers.

verses.verseString: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Those who put on the appearance.

verses.verseString: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.verseStringB: And refuse small kindnesses.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.verseStringB: We have given you plenty.

verses.verseString: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.verseStringB: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.verseStringB: He who hates you is cut off.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “O disbelievers.

verses.verseString: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.verseStringB: I do not worship what you worship.

verses.verseString: وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.verseStringB: Nor do you worship what I worship.

verses.verseString: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَا عَبَدْتُمْ
verses.verseStringB: Nor do I serve what you serve.

verses.verseString: وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.verseStringB: Nor do you serve what I serve.

verses.verseString: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.verseStringB: To you your religion, and to me my religion.”

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.verseStringB: When Allah’s Victory and Conquest come.

verses.verseString: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: And you see the people entering Allah’s religion in crowds.

verses.verseString: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.verseStringB: Then celebrate the praises of your Lord, and seek His forgiveness. He is the Acceptor of Repentance.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.verseStringB: Condemned are the hands of Abee Lahab, and he is condemned.

verses.verseString: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.verseStringB: His wealth did not avail him, nor did what he acquired.

verses.verseString: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.verseStringB: He will enter a Blazing Fire.

verses.verseString: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.verseStringB: And his wife—the firewood carrier.

verses.verseString: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِنْ مَسَدٍ
verses.verseStringB: Around her neck is a rope of thorns.

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “He is Allah, the One.

verses.verseString: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.verseStringB: Allah, the Eternal.

verses.verseString: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.verseStringB: He begets not, nor was He begotten.

verses.verseString: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And there is none comparable to Him.”

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of Daybreak.

verses.verseString: مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.verseStringB: From the evil of what He created.

verses.verseString: وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.verseStringB: And from the evil of the darkness as it gathers.

verses.verseString: وَمِنْ شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.verseStringB: And from the evil of those who practice sorcery.

verses.verseString: وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.verseStringB: And from the evil of an envier when he envies.”

verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind.

verses.verseString: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.verseStringB: The King of humankind.

verses.verseString: إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.verseStringB: The God of humankind.

verses.verseString: مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.verseStringB: From the evil of the sneaky whisperer.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.verseStringB: Who whispers into the hearts of people.

verses.verseString: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.verseStringB: From among the jinn and among humankind.”
